GE07bhg4c11u:3: yat tvayoktaṃ vacas tena moho 'yaṃ vigato mama //1//
GE07bhg4c11u:7: pūrvādhyāyānte viṣṭabhyāham idaṃ kṛtsnam ekāṃśena sthito jagat iti viśvātmakaṃ pārameśvaraṃ rūpam utkṣiptam /
GE07bhg4c11u:8: tad-didṛkṣuḥ pūrvoktam abhinandann arjuna uvāca mad-anugrahāyeti caturbhiḥ /
GE07bhg4c11u:10: paramaṃ paramātma-niṣṭhaṃ guhyaṃ gopyam api adhyātma-saṃjñitam ātmānātma-viveka-viṣayam /
GE07bhg4c11u:11: yat tvayoktaṃ vacaḥ aśocyān anvaśocas tvam ity ādi ṣaṣṭhādhyāya-paryantaṃ yad vākyam /
GE07bhg4c11u:12: tena mamāyaṃ mohaḥ - ahaṃ hantā ete hanyante ity ādi lakṣaṇo bhramaḥ /
GE07bhg4c11u:16: pūrvādhyāye nānā-vibhūtīr uktvā viṣṭabhyāham idaṃ kṛtsnam ekāṃśena sthito jagat iti
GE07bhg4c11u:17: viśvātmakaṃ pārameśvaraṃ rūpaṃ bhagavatābhihitaṃ śrutvā paramotkaṇṭhitas tat-sākṣātkartum
GE07bhg4c11u:19: mad-anugrahāya śoka-nivṛtty-upakārāya paramaṃ niratiśaya-puruṣārtha-paryavasāyi guhyaṃ gopyaṃ yasmai kasmaicid vaktum anarham api /
GE07bhg4c11u:20: adhyātma-saṃjñitam adhyātmam iti śabditam ātmānātma-viveka-viṣayam aśocyān anvaśocas
GE07bhg4c11u:21: tvam ity ādi-ṣaṣṭhādhyāya-paryantaṃ tv apadārtha-pradhānaṃ yat tvayā parama-kāruṇikena
GE07bhg4c11u:22: sarvajñenoktaṃ vaco vākyaṃ tena vākyenāham eṣāṃ hantā mayaite hanyanta ity ādivividha-viparyāsa-lakṣaṇo
GE07bhg4c11u:27: pārtha ānandito darśayitvā svaṃ hariṇā punaḥ //
GE07bhg4c11u:28: pūrvādhyāyānte viṣṭabhyāham idaṃ kṛtsnam ekāṃśena sthito jagat iti sarva-vibhūty-āśrayam
GE07bhg4c11u:29: ādi-puruṣaṃ sva-priya-sakhasyāṃśaṃ śrutvā paramānanda-nimagnas tad-rūpaṃ didṛkṣamāṇo
GE07bhg4c11u:31: adhyātmaṃ iti saptamy-arthe avyayībhāvād ātmanīty arthaḥ /
GE07bhg4c11u:32: ātmani yā yā saṃjñā vibhūti-lakṣaṇā sā saṃjātā yasya tad-vacaḥ /
GE07bhg4c11u:37: pūrvatra aham ātmā guḍākeśa sarva-bhūtāśaya-sthitaḥ iti vibhūti-kathanopakrame viṣṭabhyāham
GE07bhg4c11u:38: idaṃ kṛtsnam iti tad-upasaṃhāre ca nikhila-vibhūty-āśrayo mahat-sraṣṭā puruṣaḥ svasya kṛṣṇasyāvatāraḥ,
GE07bhg4c11u:39: sa tu mahat-sraṣṭādi-sarvāvatārīti tan-mukhāt pratītya sakhyānanda-sindhu-nimagno 'rjunas tat-puruṣa-rūpaṃ didṛkṣuḥ kṛṣṇoktam anuvadati mad iti /
GE07bhg4c11u:40: mad-anugrahāyādhyātma-saṃjñitam vibhūti-viṣayakaṃ yad vacas tvayoktaṃ tena mama mohaḥ kathaṃ vidyām ity-ādy-ukto vigato naṣṭaḥ /
GE07bhg4c11u:41: adhyātmam ātmani paramātmani tvayi yā vibhūti-lakṣaṇā saṃjñā sā jātā /
GE07bhg4c11u:43: paramaṃ guhyam atirahasyaṃ tvad-anyāgamyam ity arthaḥ //1//
GE07bhg4c11u:45: bhavāpyayau hi bhūtānāṃ śrutau vistaraśo mayā /
GE07bhg4c11u:48: bhūtānāṃ bhavāpyayau sṛṣṭi-pralayau tvattaḥ sakāśād eva bhavataḥ /
GE07bhg4c11u:50: ahaṃ kṛtsnasya jagataḥ prabhavaḥ pralayas tathā ity ādau /
GE07bhg4c11u:52: kamalasya patre iva suprasanne viśāle akṣiṇī yasya tava he kamala-patrākṣa /
GE07bhg4c11u:56: aparimitaṃ mahattvaṃ ca śrutam - avyaktaṃ vyaktim āpannaṃ manyante mām abuddhayaḥ iti /
GE07bhg4c11u:58: na ca māṃ tāni karmāṇi nibadhnanti iti /
GE07bhg4c11u:60: atas tvat-paratantratvād api jīvānām ahaṃ kartety ādir madīyo moho vigata
GE07bhg4c11u:63: tathā saptamād ārabhya daśama-paryantaṃ tat-padārtha-nirṇaya-pradhānam api bhagavato vacanaṃ mayā śrutam ity āha bhavāpyayāv iti /
GE07bhg4c11u:64: bhūtānāṃ bhavāpyayāv utpatti-pralayau tvatta eva bhavantau tvatta eva vistaraśo mayā śrutau na tu saṃkṣepeṇāsakṛd ity arthaḥ /
GE07bhg4c11u:65: kamalasya patre iva dīrghe raktānte parama-manorame akṣiṇī yasya tava sa tvaṃ he kamala-patrākṣa /
GE07bhg4c11u:67: na kevalaṃ bhavāpyayau tvattaḥ śrutau mahātmanas tava bhāvo māhātmyam atiśayaiśvaryaṃ
GE07bhg4c11u:70: sopādhikaṃ nirupādhikam api cāvyayam akṣayaṃ mayā śrutam iti pariṇatam anuvartate ca-kārāt //2 //
GE07bhg4c11u:72: asmin ṣaṭke tu bhavāpyayau sṛṣṭi-saṃhārau tvatta iti ahaṃ kṛtsnasya jagataḥ prabhavaḥ
GE07bhg4c11u:73: pralayas tathā ity ādināvyayaṃ māhātmyaṃ sṛṣṭy-ādi-kartṛtve 'py adhikārāsaṅgādi-lakṣaṇaṃ
GE07bhg4c11u:74: mayā tatam idaṃ sarvam iti na ca māṃ tāni karmāṇi nibadhnanti ity ādinā //2 //
GE07bhg4c11u:77: kamala-patre ivātiramye dīrgha-raktānte cākṣiṇī yasyeti premātiśayāt saundaryātiśayollekhaḥ /
GE07bhg4c11u:78: tvattas tvad-dhetukau bhūtānāṃ bhavāpyayau sarga-pralayau mayā tvattaḥ sakāśād vistaraśo
GE07bhg4c11u:79: 'sakṛt śrutau ahaṃ kṛtsnasya jagataḥ prabhavaḥ pralayas tathā ity ādināvyayaṃ nityaṃ
GE07bhg4c11u:80: māhātmyam aiśvaryaṃ ca tava sarva-kartṛtve 'pi nirvikāratvaṃ sarva-niyantṛte 'py
GE07bhg4c11u:81: asaṅgatvam ity evam ādi tvatta eva mayā vistaraśaḥ śrutam mayā tatam idaṃ sarvam ity ādibhiḥ //2 //
GE07bhg4c11u:83: evam etad yathāttha tvam ātmānaṃ parameśvara /
GE07bhg4c11u:84: draṣṭum icchāmi te rūpam aiśvaraṃ puruṣottama //3//
GE07bhg4c11u:85: śrīdharaḥ : kiṃ ca evam etad iti /
GE07bhg4c11u:86: bhavāpyayau hi bhūtānām ity ādi mayā śrutam /
GE07bhg4c11u:87: yathā cedānīm ātmānaṃ tvam āttha viṣṭabhyāham idaṃ kṛtsnam ekāṃśena sthito jagat ity evaṃ kathayasi he parameśvara /
GE07bhg4c11u:90: tathāpi he puruṣottama tavaiśvarya-śakti-vīrya-tejobhiḥ sampannaṃ tad-rūpaṃ kautūhalād ahaṃ draṣṭum icchāmi //3//
GE07bhg4c11u:92: he parameśvara yathā yena prakāreṇa sopādhikena nirupādhikena ca niratiśaiśvaryeṇātmānaṃ tvam āttha kathayasi tvam evam etan nānyathā /
GE07bhg4c11u:93: tvad-vacasi kutrāpi mamāviśvāsa-śaṅkā nāsty evety arthaḥ /
GE07bhg4c11u:94: yadyapy evaṃ tathāpi kṛtārthī-bubhūṣayā draṣṭum icchāmi te tava rūpam aiśvaraṃ jñānaiśvarya-śakti-bala-vīrya-tejobhiḥ sampannam adbhutaṃ he puruṣottama /
GE07bhg4c11u:95: sambodhanena tvad-vacasy aviśvāso mama nāsti didṛkṣā ca mahatī vartata iti sarvajñatvāt tvaṃ jānāsi sarvāntaryāmitvāc ceti sūcayati //3//
GE07bhg4c11u:97: idānīm ātmānaṃ tvam yathāttha viṣṭabhyāham idaṃ kṛtsnam ekāṃśena sthito jagat iti,
GE07bhg4c11u:98: tac caivam eva mama nātra ko 'py aviśvāso 'stīti bhāvaḥ /
GE07bhg4c11u:99: kintu tad api saṃhṛtārtho bubhūṣayā tavaiśvaraṃ tad-rūpaṃ draṣṭum icchāmi yenaikāṃśeneśvara-rūpeṇa tvaṃ jagat viṣṭabhya vartase /
GE07bhg4c11u:100: tasyaiva te rūpam aham idānīṃ cakṣurbhyāṃ draṣṭum icchāmīty arthaḥ //3//
GE07bhg4c11u:101: baladevaḥ : evam iti viṣṭabhyāham idaṃ ity ādinā yathā tam ātmānaṃ svam āttha bravīṣi,
GE07bhg4c11u:102: tad etad evam eva na tava me saṃśaya-leśo 'pi tathāpi tavaiśvaraṃ sarva-praśāstṛ tad-rūpam ahaṃ kautukād draṣṭum icchāmi /
GE07bhg4c11u:103: he parameśvara he puruṣottameti sambodhayan mama tad-didṛkṣāṃ jānāsy eva /
GE07bhg4c11u:107: manyase yadi tac chakyaṃ mayā draṣṭum iti prabho /
GE07bhg4c11u:108: yogeśvara tato me tvaṃ darśayātmānam avyayam //4//
GE07bhg4c11u:109: śrīdharaḥ : na cāhaṃ draṣṭum icchāmīty etāvataiva tvayā tad-rūpaṃ darśayitavyam /
GE07bhg4c11u:113: mayārjunena tad-rūpaṃ draṣṭuṃ śaktyam iti yadi manyase /
GE07bhg4c11u:114: tatas tarhi tad-rūpavantam ātmānam avyayaṃ nityaṃ mama darśaya //4//
GE07bhg4c11u:116: draṣṭum ayogye kutas te didṛkṣety āsaṅkayāha manyasa iti /
GE07bhg4c11u:119: tat tavaiśvaraṃ rūpaṃ mayārjunena draṣṭum śakyam iti yadi manyase jānāsīcchasi vā /
GE07bhg4c11u:120: he yogeśvara sarveṣām aṇimādi-siddhi-śālināṃ yogānāṃ yoginām īśvara tatas tvad-icchā-vaśād
GE07bhg4c11u:121: eva me mahyam atyartham arthite tvaṃ parama-kāruṇiko darśaya cākṣuṣa-jñāna-viṣayī-kāraya
GE07bhg4c11u:124: yogeśvareti ayogyasyāpi mama tad-darśana-yogyatāyāṃ tava yogaiśvaryam eva kāraṇam iti bhāvaḥ //4//
GE07bhg4c11u:125: baladevaḥ : aiśvarya-darśane bhagavan-saṃmatiṃ gṛhṇāti manyase yadīti /
GE07bhg4c11u:128: yogeśvareti sambodhayann ayogyasya me tvad-darśane tvac-chaktir eva hetur iti vyañjayati //4//
GE07bhg4c11u:131: paśya me pārtha rūpāṇi śataśo 'tha sahasraśaḥ /
GE07bhg4c11u:133: śrīdharaḥ : evaṃ prārthitaḥ sann atyadbhutaṃ rūpaṃ darśayiyan sāvadhāno bhavety evam arjunam abhimukhīkaroti śrī-bhagavān uvāca paśyeti caturbhiḥ
GE07bhg4c11u:139: nānā aneke varṇā ākṛtayaś ca yeṣāṃ tāni nānā-varṇākṛtīni //5//
GE07bhg4c11u:141: evam atyanta-bhaktenārjunena prārthitaḥ san śrī-bhagavān uvāca paśyeti /
GE07bhg4c11u:142: atra krameṇa śloka-catuṣṭaye 'pi paśyety āvṛttyātyadbhuta-rūpāṇi darśayiṣyāmi tvaṃ sāvadhāno bhavety arjunam abhimukhīkaroti bhagavān /
GE07bhg4c11u:143: śataśo 'tha sahasraśa ity aparimitāni tāni ca nānā-vidhāny aneka-prakārāṇi divyāny
GE07bhg4c11u:144: atyadbhutāni nānā vilakṣaṇā varṇā nīla-pīta-divya-prakārās tathākṛtayaś cāvayava-saṃsthāna-viśeṣā
GE07bhg4c11u:145: yeṣāṃ tāni nānā-varṇākṛtīni ca me mama rūpāṇi paśya /
GE07bhg4c11u:149: tataś ca svāṃśasya prakṛty-antaryāmiṇaḥ prathama-puruṣasya sahasra-śīrṣā puruṣaḥ sahasrākṣaḥ sahasrapāt iti puruṣa-sūkta-proktaṃ rūpaṃ prathamam idaṃ darśayāmi /
GE07bhg4c11u:150: paścāt prastutopayogitvena tasyaiva kāla-rūpatvam api jñāpayiṣyāmīti manasi vimṛṣyārjunaṃ prati sāvadhāno bhava ity abhimukhīkaroti /
GE07bhg4c11u:152: ekasminn api mat-svarūpe śataśo mat-svarūpāṇi mad-vibhūtīḥ //5//
GE07bhg4c11u:153: baladevaḥ : evam abhyarthito bhagavān prakṛty-antaryāmiṇaṃ sahasra-śirasaṃ praśāstṛtva-pradhānaṃ
GE07bhg4c11u:154: devākāraṃ svāṃśaṃ pradarśayituṃ prakṛtopayogitvāt tatraiva kālātmakatāṃ ca bodhayitum
GE07bhg4c11u:156: paśyeti padāvṛttir darśanīyānāṃ rūpāṇām atyadbhutatva-dyotanārthā ca bodhyā /
GE07bhg4c11u:157: me mama sahasra-śīrṣākāreṇa bhāsamānasyaikasyaiva śatāni sahasrāṇi ca vibhūti-bhūtāni rūpāṇi paśya arhe loṭ tāni praṣṭum arho bhavety arthaḥ
GE07bhg4c11u:159: paśyādityān vasūn rudrān aśvinau marutas tathā /
GE07bhg4c11u:164: adṛṣṭa-pūrvāṇi tvayā vānyena vā pūrvam adṛṣṭāni rūpāṇi /
GE07bhg4c11u:167: divyāni rūpāṇi paśyety uktvā tāny eva leśato 'nukrāmati dvābhyām paśyeti /
GE07bhg4c11u:168: paśyādityān dvādaśa vasūn aṣṭau rudrān ekādaśa aśvinau dvau marutaḥ sapta-saptakān ekonapañcāśat /
GE07bhg4c11u:170: bahūny anyāny adṛṣṭa-pūrvāṇi pūrvam adṛṣṭāni manuṣya-loke tvayā tvatto 'nyena vā kenacit /
GE07bhg4c11u:172: atra śataśo 'tha sahasraśaḥ nānā-vidhānīty asya vivaraṇaṃ bahūnīti ādityany ity ādi ca /
GE07bhg4c11u:173: adṛṣṭa-pūrvāṇīti divyānīty asya āścaryāṇīti nānā-varṇākṛtīnīty asyeti draṣṭavyam //6//
GE07bhg4c11u:175: baladevaḥ : kiṃ cedha mama dehe ekastham eka-deśa-sthitaṃ sa-carācaraṃ kṛtsnaṃ jagattvam adyādhunaiva paśya /
GE07bhg4c11u:176: yat tatra tatra paribhramatā tvayā varṣāyutair api draṣṭum aśakyam /
GE07bhg4c11u:178: yac ca jagad-āśraya-bhūtaṃ pradhāna-mahad-ādi-kāraṇa-svarūpaṃ sva-jaya-parājayādikaṃ cānyad draṣṭum icchāmi tad api paśya //6//
GE07bhg4c11u:181: mama dehe guḍākeśa yac cānyad draṣṭum icchasi //7//
GE07bhg4c11u:183: tatra tatra paribhramatā varṣa-koṭibhir api draṣṭum aśakyaṃ kṛtsnam api carācara-sahitaṃ jagad ihāsmin mama dehe 'vayava-rūpeṇaikatraiva svitamadyādhunaiva paśya /
GE07bhg4c11u:184: yac cānyaj jagad-āśraya-bhūtaṃ kāraṇa-svarūpaṃ jagataś cāvasthā-viśeṣādikaṃ jaya-parājayādikaṃ ca yad apy anyad draṣṭum icchasi tat sarvaṃ paśya
GE07bhg4c11u:187: samastaṃ jagad api mad-deha-sthaṃ draṣṭum arhasīty āha ihaikastham iti /
GE07bhg4c11u:188: ihāsmin mama dehe eka-stham ekasminn evāvayava-rūpeṇa sthitaṃ jagat kṛtsnaṃ samastaṃ
GE07bhg4c11u:189: sa-carācaram jaṅgama-sthāvara-sahitaṃ tatra tatra pariśramatā varṣa-koṭi-sahasreṇāpi
GE07bhg4c11u:190: draṣṭum aśakyam adyādhunaiva paśya he guḍākeśa /
GE07bhg4c11u:191: yac cānyaj jaya-parājayādikaṃ draṣṭum icchasi tad api sandehocchedāya paśya //7//
GE07bhg4c11u:193: paribhramatā tvayā varṣa-koṭibhir api draṣṭum aśakyaṃ kṛtsnam api jagat /
GE07bhg4c11u:194: iha prastāva ekasminn api mad-dehāvayave tiṣṭhaty ekastham /
GE07bhg4c11u:195: yac cānyat sva-jaya-parājayādikaṃ ca mamāsmin dehe jagad-āśraya-bhūta-kāraṇa-rūpe //7//
GE07bhg4c11u:196: baladevaḥ : kiṃ ceha mama dehe eka-stham eka-deśa-sthitaṃ sa-carācaraṃ kṛtsnaṃ jagat tvam adyādhunaiva paśya /
GE07bhg4c11u:197: yat tatra tatra paribhramatā tvayā varṣāyutair api draṣṭum aśakyaṃ tadaikadaivaikatraiva mad-anugrahād avalokas tvety arthaḥ /
GE07bhg4c11u:198: yac ca jagad-āśraya-bhūtaṃ pradhāna-mahad-ādi-kāraṇa-svarūpaṃ sva-jaya-parājayādikaṃ cānyad draṣṭum icchasi tad api paśya //7//
GE07bhg4c11u:200: na tu māṃ śakyase draṣṭum anenaiva sva-cakṣuṣā /
GE07bhg4c11u:201: divyaṃ dadāmi te cakṣuḥ paśya me yogam aiśvaram //8//
GE07bhg4c11u:202: śrīdharaḥ : yad uktam arjunena manyase yadi tac chakyam iti tatrāha na tu mām iti /
GE07bhg4c11u:203: anenaiva tu svīyena carma-cakṣuṣā māṃ draṣṭum na śakyase śakto na bhaviṣyasi /
GE07bhg4c11u:204: ato 'haṃ divyam alaukikaṃ jñānātmakaṃ cakṣus tubhyaṃ dadāmi /
GE07bhg4c11u:205: mama aiśvaram asādhāraṇaṃ yogam yuktim aghaṭana-ghaṭanā-sāmarthyaṃ paśya //8//
GE07bhg4c11u:207: yat tūktaṃ manyase yadi tac chakyaṃ mayā draṣṭum iti viśeṣaṇam āha na tu mām iti /
GE07bhg4c11u:208: anenaiva prākṛtena sva-cakṣuṣā svabhāva-siddhena cakṣuṣā māṃ divya-rūpaṃ draṣṭum na tu śakyase na śaknoṣi tu eva /
GE07bhg4c11u:209: śakyasa iti pāṭhe śakto na bhaviṣyasīty arthaḥ /
GE07bhg4c11u:210: sauvādikasyāpi śaknoter daivādikaḥ śyaṃś chāndas iti vā /
GE07bhg4c11u:212: tarhi tvāṃ draṣṭuṃ kathaṃ śaknuyām ata āha divyam aprākṛtaṃ mama divya-rūpa-darśana-kṣamaṃ
GE07bhg4c11u:213: dadāmi te tubhyaṃ cakṣus tena divyena cakṣuṣā paśya me yogam aghaṭana-ghaṭanā-sāmarthyātiśayam
GE07bhg4c11u:216: indram indrajālaṃ māyā-mayaṃ vā rūpam ity arjuna mā manyatāṃ,
GE07bhg4c11u:217: kintu sac-cid-ānanda-mayam eva svarūpam antarbhūta-sarva-jagatkam atīndriyatvenaiva viśvasitum ity etad artham āha na tv iti /
GE07bhg4c11u:218: anenaiva prākṛtena sva-cakṣuṣā māṃ cid-ghanākāraṃ draṣṭuṃ na śakyase na śaknoṣīty atas tubhyaṃ divyam aprākṛtaṃ cakṣur dadāmi /
GE07bhg4c11u:219: tenaiva paśyete prākṛta-nara-māninam arjunaṃ kam api camatkāraṃ prāpayitum eva /
GE07bhg4c11u:220: yato hy arjuno bhagavat-pārṣada-mukhyatvān narāvatāratvāc ca prākṛta-nara iva na carma-cakṣukaḥ /
GE07bhg4c11u:221: kiṃ ca sākṣād-bhagavan-mādhuryam eva sa sva-cakṣuṣā sākṣād anubhavati so 'rjuno bhagavad-aṃśaṃ draṣṭuṃ tena aśaknuvan divyaṃ cakṣur gṛhṇīyād iti kaḥ khalu nyāyaḥ ?
GE07bhg4c11u:222: eke tv evam ācakṣate bhagavato nara-līlātva-mahāmādhuryaika-grāhi
GE07bhg4c11u:224: tac cakṣur ananya-bhakta iva bhagavato deva-līlātva-sampadaṃ naiva gṛhṇāti na hi sitopala-rasāsvādinī rasanā khaṇḍaṃ guḍaṃ vā svādayituṃ śaknoti
GE07bhg4c11u:225: tasmād arjunāya tat prārthita-camatkāra-viśeṣaṃ dātuṃ deva-līlatvam aiśvaryaṃ jigrāhayiṣur bhagavān prema-rasān anukūlaṃ divyam amānuṣam eva cakṣur dadāv iti /
GE07bhg4c11u:227: baladevaḥ : manyase yadi tac chakyam ity arjuna-prārthitaṃ sampādayan nirataṃ,
GE07bhg4c11u:228: vismitaṃ kartuṃ tasmai sva-devākāra-grāhi divyaṃ cakṣur bhagavān dadāv ity āha na tu mām iti /
GE07bhg4c11u:229: anenaiva man-mādhuryaikāntena sva-cakṣuṣā yugapad-vibhāta-sahasra-sūrya-prakhyaṃ sahasra-śiraskaṃ māṃ draṣṭuṃ na śakyase na śaknoṣi /
GE07bhg4c11u:231: yathāham ātmānam atipravāhākrāntaṃ vyanadmi tathā tvac-cakṣuś ceti bhāvaḥ /
GE07bhg4c11u:232: tena mamaiśvaraṃ yogaṃ rūpaṃ paśya yujyate 'nena iti vyutpatter yogo rūpaṃ paramaṃ rūpam aiśvaram ity agrimāc ca /
GE07bhg4c11u:233: atra divyaṃ cakṣur eva dattaṃ na tu divyaṃ mano 'pīti bodhyam /
GE07bhg4c11u:235: tasya tad-rūpe ruci-prasaṅgād iha divya-dṛṣṭi-dānena liṅgena pārtha-sārathi-rūpāt sahasra-śiraso viśva-rūpasyādhikyam iti yad vadanti tat tv agre nirasyam //8//
GE07bhg4c11u:238: evam uktvā tato rājan mahā-yogeśvaro hariḥ /
GE07bhg4c11u:239: darśayām āsa pārthāya paramaṃ rūpam aiśvaram //9//
GE07bhg4c11u:240: śrīdharaḥ : evam uktvā bhagavān arjunāya svarūpaṃ darśitavān /
GE07bhg4c11u:241: tac ca rūpaṃ dṛṣṭvārjunaḥ śrī-kṛṣṇaṃ vijñāpitavān itīmam arthaṃ ṣaḍbhiḥ ślokair dhṛtarāṣṭraṃ prati sañjaya uvāca evam uktveti /
GE07bhg4c11u:243: mahān cāsau yogeśvaraś ca hariḥ paramam aiśvaraṃ rūpam darśitavān //9//
GE07bhg4c11u:246: sa ca tad dṛṣṭvā vismayāviṣṭo bhagavantaṃ vijñāpitavān itīmaṃ vṛttāntam evam uktvety ādibhiḥ ṣaḍbhiḥ ślokair dhṛtarāṣṭraṃ prati saṃjaya uvāceti
GE07bhg4c11u:247: evam na tu māṃ śakyase draṣṭum anena cakṣuṣā divyaṃ dadāmi te cakṣur ity uktvā tato divya-cakṣuḥ-pradānād anantaraṃ he rājan dhṛtarāṣṭra sthiro bhava śravaṇāya /
GE07bhg4c11u:248: mahān sarvotkṛṣṭaś cāsau yogeśvaraś ceti mahā-yogeśvaro harir bhaktānāṃ sarva-kleśāpahārī
GE07bhg4c11u:249: bhagavān darśanāyogyaṃ api darśayāmāsa pārthāyaikānta-bhaktāya paramaṃ divyaṃ rūpam aiśvaram //9 //
GE07bhg4c11u:251: baladevaḥ : evam uktvā hariḥ pārthāya viśva-rūpaṃ darśitavān /
GE07bhg4c11u:252: tac ca rūpaṃ vīkṣya pārtho harim evaṃ vijñāpitavān itīmam arthaṃ sañjayaḥ prāha evam ṣaḍbhiḥ /
GE07bhg4c11u:253: tato divya-cakṣur dānānantaraṃ he rājan dhṛtarāṣṭra /
GE07bhg4c11u:262: anekāni vaktrāṇi nayanāni ca yasmiṃs tat /
GE07bhg4c11u:265: divyāny anekāny udyatāny āyudhāni yasmiṃs tat //10//
GE07bhg4c11u:267: divyāni mālyāni ambarāṇi ca dhārayatīti tat /
GE07bhg4c11u:268: tathā divyo gandho yasya tādṛśaṃ anulepanaṃ yasya tat /
GE07bhg4c11u:275: anekāni vaktrāṇi nayanāni ca yasmin rūpe /
GE07bhg4c11u:278: divyāny anekāny udyatāny āyudhāni astrāṇi yasmiṃs tat tathārūpam /
GE07bhg4c11u:279: divyāni mālyāni puṣpa-mayāni ratnamayāni ca tathā divyāmbarāṇi vastrāṇi ca dhriyante yena tad-divya-mālyāmbara-dharaṃ /
GE07bhg4c11u:280: divyo gandho 'syeti divya-gandhas tad-anulepanam yasya tat /
GE07bhg4c11u:283: anantam aparicchinnaṃ viśvataḥ sarvato mukhāni yasmiṃs tad-rūpaṃ darśayāmāseti pūrveṇa sambandhaḥ /
GE07bhg4c11u:287: baladevaḥ : aneketi anekāni sahasrāṇi vaktrāṇi nayanāni ca yasya tad-rūpaṃ sahasra-bāho bhava viśva-mūrte ity agrima-vākyāt /
GE07bhg4c11u:289: viśvataś cakṣur uta viśvatomukhaḥ ity ādi-jñāpakāt /
GE07bhg4c11u:290: anekānām adbhutānāṃ darśanam yatra tat divyo gandho yatra tādṛg anulepanaṃ yasya tat /
GE07bhg4c11u:291: devaṃ dyotamānam anantam apāraṃ viśvataḥ sarvato mukhāni yasya tat //10-11//
GE07bhg4c11u:294: yadi bhāḥ sadṛśī sā syād bhāsas tasya mahātmanaḥ //12//
GE07bhg4c11u:297: sūrya-sahasrasya yugapad utthitasya yadi yugapad utthitā bhāḥ prabhā bhavet tarhi sā tadā mahātmano viśvarūpasya bhāsaḥ prabhāyā kathañcit sadṛśī syāt /
GE07bhg4c11u:302: divi antarikṣe sūryāṇāṃ sahasrasyāparimita-sūrya-samūhasya yugapad uditasya yugapad
GE07bhg4c11u:303: utthitā bhāḥ prabhā yadi bhavet tadā sā tasya mahātmano viśvarūpasya bhāso dīpteḥ
GE07bhg4c11u:304: sadṛśī tulyā yadi syād yadi vā na syāt tato 'pi nūnaṃ viśvarūpasyaiva bhā atiricyetety ahaṃ manye /
GE07bhg4c11u:307: utprekṣā vyañjayantī sarvathā nirupamatvam eva vyanakti ubhau yadi vyomni pṛthak-pravāhāv ity ādivat //12 //
GE07bhg4c11u:309: ekadaiva yadi bhāḥ kāntir utthitā bhavet tadā tasya mahātmano viśvarūpa-puruṣasya bhāsaḥ prabhāyāḥ kānteḥ kathañcit sadṛśī bhavet //12//
GE07bhg4c11u:311: divi ākāśe yugapad utthitasya sūrya-sahasrasya bhāḥ kāntiś ced yugapad utthitā bhavet tarhi sā tasya mahātmano viśva-rūpasya harer bhāsa ekasyāḥ kānteḥ sadṛśī syāt tadeti /
GE07bhg4c11u:314: vyaṅgā satī sarvathā tat-kānter nairupamyaṃ vyañjayati /
GE07bhg4c11u:319: śrīdharaḥ : tataḥ kiṃ vṛttam ity apekṣāyām āha saṃjayaḥ tatreti /
GE07bhg4c11u:320: anekadhā pravibhaktaṃ nānā-vibhāgenāvasthitaṃ kṛtsnaṃ jagad devadevasya śarīre tad-avayavatvenaikatraivaa pṛthag-avasthitaṃ tadā pāṇḍavo 'rjuno 'paśyat //13//
GE07bhg4c11u:322: ihaikasthaṃ jagat kṛtsnaṃ paśyādya sa-carācaram iti bhagavad-ājñaptam apy anubhūtavān arjuna ity āha tatraikastham iti /
GE07bhg4c11u:323: ekastham ekatra sthitaṃ jagat kṛtsnaṃ pravibhaktam anekadhā /
GE07bhg4c11u:324: deva-pitṛ-manuṣyādi-nānā-prakārair apaśyad devadevasya bhagavataḥ tatra viśvarūpe śarīre pāṇḍavo 'rjunas tadā viśvarūpāścarya-darśana-daśāyām
GE07bhg4c11u:326: tatra tasmin yuddha-bhumāv eva devadevasya śarīre jagat brahmāṇḍaṃ kṛtsnaṃ sarvam eva gaṇayitum aśakyam ity arthaḥ /
GE07bhg4c11u:327: pravibhaktaṃ pṛthak pṛthaktayā sthitam ekastham ekadeśasthaṃ pratiromakūpasthaṃ pratikukṣisthaṃ vety arthaḥ /
GE07bhg4c11u:328: anekadhā mṛnmayaṃ hiraṇmayaṃ maṇimayaṃ vā pañcāśat-koṭi-yojana-pramāṇaṃ śata-koṭi-yojana-pramāṇaṃ lakṣa-koṭy-ādi-yojana-pramāṇaṃ vety arthaḥ
GE07bhg4c11u:329: baladevaḥ : tataḥ kim abhūd ity apekṣāyām āha tatreti /
GE07bhg4c11u:330: tatra yuddha-bhūmau devadevasya kṛṣṇasya vyañjita-sahasra-śiraske śarīre śrī-vigrahe kṛtsnaṃ nikhilaṃ jagad brahmāṇḍaṃ tadā pāṇḍavo 'paśyat
GE07bhg4c11u:332: anekadheti mṛṇmayaṃ svarṇa-mayaṃ ratna-mayaṃ vā laghu-madhye bṛhad-bhūtaṃ vety arthaḥ //13//
GE07bhg4c11u:336: śrīdharaḥ : evaṃ dṛṣṭvā kiṃ kṛtavān iti ?
GE07bhg4c11u:339: visamyenāviṣṭo vyāptaḥ san hṛṣṭāny utpulakitāni romāṇi yasya sa dhanañjayaḥ /
GE07bhg4c11u:340: tam eva devaṃ śirasā praṇamya kṛtāñjaliḥ sampuṭākṛta-hasto bhūtvā /
GE07bhg4c11u:343: evam adbhuta-darśane 'py arjuno na vibhayāṃcakāra nāpi netre saṃcacāra,
GE07bhg4c11u:349: ataeva hṛṣṭa-romā pulakitaḥ san sa prakhyāta-mahādeva-saṅgrāmādi-prabhāvo dhanaṃjayo
GE07bhg4c11u:350: yudhiṣṭhira-rājasūya uttara-go-grahe ca sarvātrājño jitvā dhanam āhṛtavān iti prathita-mahā-parākramo
GE07bhg4c11u:352: devaṃ tam eva viśvarūpa-dharaṃ nārāyaṇaṃ śirasā bhūmi-lagnena praṇamya prakarṣeṇa bhakti-śraddhātiśayena natvā namaskṛtya kṛtāñjaliḥ sampuṭīkṛta-hasta-yugaḥ
GE07bhg4c11u:355: sāttvika-romaharṣeṇa namaskāreṇāñjali-kareṇa ca vyabhicāriṇā cānubhāvākṣiptena vā
GE07bhg4c11u:356: dhṛti-mati-harṣa-vitarkādinā paripoṣāt sa-vāsanānāṃ śrotṝṇāṃ tādṛśaś citta-camatkāro
GE07bhg4c11u:357: 'pi tad-bhedānadhyavasāyāt paripoṣaṃ gataḥ paramānandāsvāda-rūpeṇādbhuta-raso bhavatīti sūcitam //14 //
GE07bhg4c11u:359: baladevaḥ : evaṃ kṛṣṇa-tattvavid arjunas tasmin sattvena jñātaṃ sahasra-śīrṣatvam adhunā vīkṣyādbhutaṃ rasam anvabhūd ity āha tata iti /
GE07bhg4c11u:361: dhanaṃjayeti dhīro 'pi vismayenāviṣṭo hṛṣṭa-romā pulakito devaṃ śirasā bhū-lagnena praṇamya kṛtāñjaliḥ sann abhāṣata /
GE07bhg4c11u:362: atra bhaya-netra-saṃvaraṇādikaṃ tasya nābhūt kintv adbhuto raso 'bhyudaid iti vyañjate /
GE07bhg4c11u:363: iha tādṛśo harir ālambano muhur muhus tad-vīkṣaṇam uddīpanaṃ praṇati-pāṇi-yogāv anubhāvau,
GE07bhg4c11u:364: romāñcaḥ sāttvikas tair ākṣiptā matir dhṛti-harṣādayaḥ sañcāriṇaḥ /
GE07bhg4c11u:371: ṛṣīṃś ca sarvān uragāṃś ca divyān //15//
GE07bhg4c11u:375: tathā sarvān bhūta-viśeṣāṇāṃ sthāvarāṇāṃ jaṅgamānāṃ ca nānā-saṃsthānānāṃ saṃghān samūhān /
GE07bhg4c11u:376: tathā brahmāṇam caturmukham īśam īśitāraṃ sarveṣāṃ kamalāsana-stham pṛthvī-padma-madhye meru-karṇikāsana-sthaṃ bhagavan-nābhi-kamalāsanastham iti vā /
GE07bhg4c11u:377: tathā ṛṣīṃś ca sarvān vaśiṣṭādīn brahma-putrān /
GE07bhg4c11u:378: uragāṃś ca divyān prākṛtān vāsuki-prabhṛtīn paśyāmīti sarvatrānvayaḥ //15//
GE07bhg4c11u:380: yad bhagavatā darśitaṃ viśvarūpaṃ tad bhagavad-dattena divyena cakṣuṣā sarva-lokādṛśyam api paśyāmy aho mama bhāgya-prakarṣa iti svānubhavam āviṣkurvan arjuna uvāca paśyāmīti /
GE07bhg4c11u:381: paśyāmi cākṣuṣa-jñāna-viṣayīkaromi he deva tava dehe viśvarūpe devān vasv-ādīn sarvān /
GE07bhg4c11u:382: tathā bhūta-viśeṣāṇāṃ sthāvarāṇāṃ jaṅgamānāṃ ca nānā-saṃsthānānāṃ saṃghān samūhān /
GE07bhg4c11u:383: tathā brahmāṇam caturmukham īśam īśitāraṃ sarveṣāṃ kamalāsana-stham pṛthvī-padma-madhye meru-karṇikāsana-sthaṃ bhagavan-nābhi-kamalāsanastham iti vā /
GE07bhg4c11u:384: tathā ṛṣīṃś ca sarvān vaśiṣṭādīn brahma-putrān /
GE07bhg4c11u:385: uragāṃś ca divyān prākṛtān vāsuki-prabhṛtīn paśyāmīti sarvatrānvayaḥ //15//
GE07bhg4c11u:389: baladevaḥ : kim abhāṣata tad āha paśyāmīti saptadaśabhiḥ /
GE07bhg4c11u:391: brahmāṇam caturmukham kamalāsane caturmukhe sthitam tad-antaryāmiṇam īśam garbhodaka-śayam urugān vāsuky-ādīn sarpān //15//
GE07bhg4c11u:395: nāntaṃ na madhyaṃ na punas tavādiṃ
GE07bhg4c11u:398: anekāni bāhv-ādīni yasya tādṛśaṃ tvāṃ paśyāmi /
GE07bhg4c11u:399: anantāni rūpāṇi yasya taṃ tvāṃ sarvataḥ paśyāmi /
GE07bhg4c11u:400: tava tvaṃ taṃ madhyamādiṃ ca na paśyāmi //16//
GE07bhg4c11u:404: bāhava udarāṇi vaktrāṇi netrāṇi cānekāni yasya tam aneka-bāhūdara-vaktra-netraṃ paśyāmi /
GE07bhg4c11u:405: tvā tvāṃ sarvataḥ sarvatrānantāni rūpāṇi yasyeti taṃ /
GE07bhg4c11u:406: tava tu punar nāntam avasānaṃ na madhyaṃ nāpy ādiṃ paśyāmi sarva-gatatvāt /
GE07bhg4c11u:412: baladevaḥ : yatra dehe devādīn dṛṣṭavāṃs taṃ viśinaṣṭi aneketi /
GE07bhg4c11u:423: sarvato dīptimantam tejaḥ-puñja-rūpaṃ tathā durnirīkṣyaṃ draṣṭum aśakyam /
GE07bhg4c11u:424: tatra hetuḥ - dīptayor analārkayor dyutir iva dyutis tejo yasya tam /
GE07bhg4c11u:425: ataevāprameyam evaṃbhūta iti niścetum aśakyaṃ tvāṃ samantataḥ paśyāmi //17//
GE07bhg4c11u:427: tam eva viśvarūpaṃ bhagavantaṃ prakārānantaraṃ viśinaṣṭi kirīṭinam iti /
GE07bhg4c11u:428: kirīṭa-gadā-cakra-dhāriṇaṃ ca sarvato dīptimantam tejo-rāśiṃ ca /
GE07bhg4c11u:429: ataeva durnirīkṣyaṃ divyena cakṣuṣā vinā nirīkṣitum aśakyam /
GE07bhg4c11u:432: dīptayor analārkayor dyutir iva dyutir yasya tam aprameyam iti paricchettum aśakyaṃ samantāt sarvataḥ paśyāmi divyena cakṣuṣā /
GE07bhg4c11u:435: baladevaḥ : vidhāntareṇa tam eva viśinaṣṭi kirīṭinam iti /
GE07bhg4c11u:436: durnirīkṣyam api tvām ahaṃ paśyāmi tat-prasādād divya-cakṣur-lābhāt /
GE07bhg4c11u:438: aprameyam idam ittham iti pramātum aśakyam //17//
GE07bhg4c11u:444: śrīdharaḥ : yasmād evaṃ tavātakaiśvaryaṃ tasmāt tvam iti /
GE07bhg4c11u:456: tvam evākṣaraṃ paramaṃ brahma veditavyaṃ mumukṣubhir vedānta-śravaṇādinā /
GE07bhg4c11u:457: tvam evāsya viśvasya paraṃ prakṛṣṭaṃ nidhīyate 'sminn iti nidhānam āśrayaḥ /
GE07bhg4c11u:462: ataeva sanātanaś cirantanaḥ puruṣo yaḥ paramātmā sa eva tvaṃ me mato vidito 'si //18//
GE07bhg4c11u:464: veditavyaṃ muktair jñeyam yad akṣaraṃ brahma-tattvam /
GE07bhg4c11u:466: baladevaḥ : acintya-mahaiśvarya-vīkṣaṇāt tvam aham evaṃ niścinomīty āha tvam iti /
GE07bhg4c11u:467: atha parā yayā tad akṣaram adhigamyate,
GE07bhg4c11u:468: yat tad adṛśyam [MuṇḍU 1.5-6] ity ādi-vedānta-vākyair veditavyaṃ yat paramaṃ sa-śrīkam
GE07bhg4c11u:469: akṣaraṃ tattvam eva nidhānam āśrayo 'vyayas tvam avināśī śāśvata-dharma-goptā vedokta-dharma-pālakas tvam /
GE07bhg4c11u:470: sa kāraṇaṃ kāraṇādhipādhipo na cāsya kaścij janitā na cādhipaḥ [ŚvetU 6.9] iti mantra-varṇoktaḥ sanātanaḥ purāṇaḥ puruṣas tvam eva //18//
GE07bhg4c11u:478: ananta-vīryam anantaṃ vīryaṃ prabhāvo yasya tam /
GE07bhg4c11u:480: śaśi-sūryau netre yasya tādṛśaṃ tvāṃ paśyāmi /
GE07bhg4c11u:481: tathā dīpto hutāśo 'gnir vaktreṣu yasya tam /
GE07bhg4c11u:485: ādir utpattir madhyaṃ sthitir anto vināśas tad-rahitam anādi-madhyāntam /
GE07bhg4c11u:490: dīpto hutāśo vaktraṃ yasya vaktreṣu yasyeti vā tam /
GE07bhg4c11u:491: svatejasā viśvaṃ idaṃ tapantam santāpayantaṃ tvā tvāṃ paśyāmi //19//
GE07bhg4c11u:493: kiṃ ca anādīty atra mahā-vismaya-rasa-sindhu-nimagnasyārjunasya vacasi paunaruktyaṃ na doṣāya /
GE07bhg4c11u:494: yad uktaṃ prasāde vismaye harṣe dvi-trir-uktaṃ na duṣyati //19//
GE07bhg4c11u:496: ādi-madhyāvasāna-śūnyam anantāni vīryāṇi tad-upalakṣaṇāni samagrāṇy aiśvaryāṇi ṣaṭ yasya tam ananta-bāhuṃ sahasra-bhujaṃ śaśi-sūryopamāni netrāṇi yasya taṃ /
GE07bhg4c11u:497: devādiṣu praṇateṣu prasanna-netraṃ tad-viparīteṣu asurādiṣu krūra-netram ity arthaḥ /
GE07bhg4c11u:499: arjunasya vākye kvacit punar-uktis tasya vismayāviṣṭatvān na doṣāya /
GE07bhg4c11u:500: yad uktaṃ prasāde vismaye harṣe dvi-trir-uktaṃ na duṣyati iti //19//
GE07bhg4c11u:507: dyāv-āpṛthivyor idam antaram antarīkṣaṃ tvayaivaikena vyāptam /
GE07bhg4c11u:510: tvadīyam idam ugraṃ ghoraṃ rūpaṃ dṛṣṭvā loka-trayaṃ pravyathitam atibhītam /
GE07bhg4c11u:513: prakṛtasya bhagavad-rūpasya vyāptim āha dyāv-āpṛthivyor iti /
GE07bhg4c11u:514: dyāv-āpṛthivyor idam antaram antarīkṣaṃ hi tvayaivaikena vyāptam /
GE07bhg4c11u:516: dṛṣṭvādbhutam atyanta-vismaya-karam idam ugraṃ duradhigamaṃ mahātejasvitvāt tava rūpam upalabhya loka-trayaṃ pravyathitam atyanta-bhītaṃ jātaṃ he mahātman sādhūnām abhaya-dāyaka /
GE07bhg4c11u:519: atha prastopayogitvāt tasyaiva rūpasya kāla-rūpatvaṃ darśayāmāsa dyāvety ādi daśabhiḥ //20//
GE07bhg4c11u:520: baladevaḥ : atha tasyaiva rūpasya prakṛtyopayogitvena kāla-rūpatāṃ darśitavān ity āha dyāveti daśabhiḥ /
GE07bhg4c11u:521: dyāv-āpṛthivyor antaram antarīkṣaṃ tathā sarvā diśaś caikena tvayā vyāptam /
GE07bhg4c11u:522: tavedam aparimitam adbhutam ugraṃ ca rūpaṃ dṛṣṭvā loka-trayaṃ pravyathitam bhītaṃ saṃcalanaṃ ca bhavati /
GE07bhg4c11u:524: atredam avagamyate tadā yuddha-darśanāya ye trailokyasthā mitrodāsīnā devāsurā gandharva-kinnarādayḥ
GE07bhg4c11u:525: samāgatās tair api bhaktimadbhir bhagavad-datta-divya-netrais tad-rūpaṃ dṛṣṭaṃ na
GE07bhg4c11u:526: tv ekenaivārjunena svapateva svāpnika-rathādīni nijaiśvaryasya bahu-sākṣikatārtham etat //20 //
GE07bhg4c11u:533: amī sura-saṃghā bhītāḥ santas tvāṃ viśanti śaraṇaṃ praviśanti /
GE07bhg4c11u:534: teṣām madhye kecid atibhītā dūrata eva sthitvā kṛta-sampuṭa-kara-yugalāḥ santo gṛṇanti jaya jaya rakṣa rakṣeti prārthayante /
GE07bhg4c11u:537: adhunā bhū-bhāra-saṃhara-kāritvam ātmanaḥ prakaṭayantaṃ bhagavantaṃ paśyann āha amīti /
GE07bhg4c11u:538: amī hi sura-saṃghā vasv-ādi-deva-gaṇā bhū-bhārāvatārārthaṃ manuṣya-rūpeṇāvatīrṇā yudhyamānāḥ santas tvā tvāṃ viśanti praviśanto dṛśyante /
GE07bhg4c11u:539: evam asura-saṅghā iti pada-cchedena bhū-bhāra-bhūtā duryodhanādayas tvāṃ viśantīty api vaktavyam /
GE07bhg4c11u:540: evam ubhayor api senayoḥ kecid bhītāḥ palāyane 'py aśaktāḥ santaḥ prāñjalayo gṛṇanti stuvanti tvām /
GE07bhg4c11u:541: evaṃ pratyupasthite yuddha utpātādi-nimittāny upalakṣya svasty astu sarvasya jagata
GE07bhg4c11u:542: ity uktvā maharṣi-siddha-saṅghā nārada-prabhṛtayo yuddha-darśanārtham āgatā viśva-vināśa-parihārāya
GE07bhg4c11u:543: stuvanti tvāṃ stutibhir guṇotkarṣa-pratipādikābhir vāgbhiḥ puṣkalābhiḥ paripūrṇārthābhiḥ //21 //
GE07bhg4c11u:545: baladevaḥ : amī sura-saṅghās tvāṃ śaraṇaṃ viśanti /
GE07bhg4c11u:546: teṣu kecid bhītā dūrataḥ sthitvā prāñjalayaḥ santo gṛṇanti pāhi pāhi prabho asmān iti prārthayante /
GE07bhg4c11u:547: mahatīṃ bhītim ālakṣya maharṣi-saṅghāḥ siddha-saṅghāś ca viśvasya svasty astu ity uktvā stuvanti //21//
GE07bhg4c11u:562: smṛteś ca yāvad uṣṇaṃ bhaved annaṃ tāvad aśnanti vāgvatāḥ /
GE07bhg4c11u:563: tāvad aśnanti pitaro yāvan noktā havir guṇāḥ //
GE07bhg4c11u:565: gandharvāś ca yakṣāś ca asurāś ca virocanādayaḥ /
GE07bhg4c11u:567: sarva eva vismitāḥ santa tvāṃ vīkṣanta ity anvayaḥ //22//
GE07bhg4c11u:570: rudrāś cādityāś ca vasavo ye ca sādhyā nāma deva-gaṇā viśve tulya-vibhaktika-viśvadeva-śabdābhyām
GE07bhg4c11u:571: ucyamānā deva-gaṇā aśvinau nāsatya-damrau maruta ekonapañcāśad-deva-gaṇā ūṣmapāś
GE07bhg4c11u:572: ca pitaro gandharvāṇāṃ yakṣāṇāṃ asurāṇāṃ siddhānāṃ ca saṃghāḥ samūhā vīkṣante paśyanti
GE07bhg4c11u:573: tvā tvāṃ tādṛśādbhuta-darśanāt te sarva eva vismitāś ca vismayam alaukika-camatkāra-viśeṣam
GE07bhg4c11u:579: uṣmapāḥ pitaraḥ uṣmāṇaṃ pibanti iti nirukteḥ /
GE07bhg4c11u:580: uṣmabhāgā hi pitaraḥ iti śruteś ca //22//
GE07bhg4c11u:587: he mahā-bāho mahad atyūrjitaṃ tava rūpaṃ dṛṣṭvā lokāḥ sarve pravyathitā atibhītāḥ /
GE07bhg4c11u:590: bahūni vaktrāṇi netrāṇi ca yasmiṃs tat /
GE07bhg4c11u:591: bahavo bāhava ūravaḥ pādāś ca yasmiṃs tat /
GE07bhg4c11u:596: loka-trayaṃ pravyathitam ity uktam upasaṃharati rūpam iti /
GE07bhg4c11u:597: he mahā-bāho te tava rūpaṃ dṛṣṭvā lokāḥ sarve 'pi prāṇinaḥ pravyathitās tathāhaṃ pravyathito bhayena /
GE07bhg4c11u:600: bahūni vaktrāṇi netrāṇi ca yasmiṃs tat /
GE07bhg4c11u:601: bahavo bāhava ūravaḥ pādāś ca yasmiṃs tat /
GE07bhg4c11u:603: bahubhir daṃṣṭrābhiḥ karālam atibhayānakaṃ dṛṣṭvaiva mat-sahitāḥ sarve lokā bhayena pīḍitā ity arthaḥ //23//
GE07bhg4c11u:605: baladevaḥ : loka-trayaṃ pravyathitam ity uktam upasaṃharati rūpaṃ mahad iti /
GE07bhg4c11u:613: dhṛtiṃ na vindāmi śamaṃ ca viṣṇo //24//
GE07bhg4c11u:614: śrīdharaḥ : na kevalaṃ bhīto 'ham ity etāvad eva /
GE07bhg4c11u:616: nabhaḥ spṛśatīti nabhaḥ-spṛk tam antarīkṣa-vyāpinam ity arthaḥ /
GE07bhg4c11u:621: evambhūtaṃ hi tvāṃ dṛṣṭvā pravyathitāntarātmā mano yasya so 'haṃ dhṛtiṃ dhairyam upaśamaṃ na labhe //24//
GE07bhg4c11u:624: na kevalaṃ pravyathita evāhaṃ tvāṃ dṛṣṭvā kintu pravyathito 'ntarātmā mano yasya
GE07bhg4c11u:625: so 'haṃ dhṛtiṃ dhairyaṃ dehendriyādi-dhāraṇa-sāmarthyaṃ śamaṃ ca manaḥ-prasādaṃ na vindāmi na labhe /
GE07bhg4c11u:629: dīptaṃ prajvalitam aneka-varṇaṃ bhayaṅkara-nānā-saṃsthāna-yuktaṃ vyāttānanaṃ vivṛtta-mukhaṃ
GE07bhg4c11u:631: dhṛtiṃ śamaṃ ca na vvindāmīty anvayaḥ //24 //
GE07bhg4c11u:634: baladevaḥ : tathaitad-rūpopasaṃhāra-phalakaṃ dainyaṃ prakāśayann āha nabhaḥ-spṛśam iti dvābhyām /
GE07bhg4c11u:635: ahaṃ ca tvāṃ dṛṣṭvā pravyathitāntarātmā bhītodvigna-manāḥ san dhṛtim upaśamaṃ ca na vindāmi na labhe /
GE07bhg4c11u:643: diśo na jāne na labhe ca śarma
GE07bhg4c11u:646: he deveśa tava mukhāni dṛṣṭvā bhayāveśena diśo na jānāmi /
GE07bhg4c11u:653: daṃṣṭrābhiḥ karālāni vikṛtatvena bhayaṅkarāṇi pralaya-kālānala-sadṛśāni ca te mukhāni dṛṣṭvaiva na tu tāni prāpya bhaya-vaśena diśaḥ pūrvāparādi-vivekena na jāne /
GE07bhg4c11u:654: ato na labhe ca śarma sukhaṃ tvad-rūpa-darśane 'pi /
GE07bhg4c11u:655: ato he deveśa he jagannivāsa prasīda prasanno bhava māṃ prati /
GE07bhg4c11u:656: yathā bhavābhāvena tvad-darśanajaṃ sukhaṃ prāpnuyām iti śeṣaḥ //25//
GE07bhg4c11u:670: śrīdharaḥ : yac cānyad draṣṭum icchasīty anenāsmin saṅgrāme bhāvi-jaya-parājayādikaṃ ca mama dehe paśyeti yad bhagavatoktaṃ tad idānīṃ paśyann āha amī ceti pañcabhiḥ /
GE07bhg4c11u:672: avani-pālānāṃ jayadrathādīnāṃ rājñāṃ saṅghaiḥ samūhaiḥ sahaiva /
GE07bhg4c11u:674: tathā bhīṣmaś ca droṇaś cāsau sūta-putraḥ karṇaś ca /
GE07bhg4c11u:676: api tu pratiyoddhāro 'smadīyā ye yodha-mukhyāḥ śikhaṇḍi-dhṛṣṭadyumnādayas taiḥ saha //26//
GE07bhg4c11u:677: vakrāṇīti ye ete sarve tvaramāṇā dhāvantas tava daṃṣṭrābhiḥ karālāni vikṛtāni bhayṅkarāṇi
GE07bhg4c11u:678: vaktrāṇi viśanti teṣāṃ madhye kecic cūrṇīkṛtair uttamāṅgaiḥ śirobhir upalakṣitā danta-sandhiṣu
GE07bhg4c11u:681: asmākaṃ jayaṃ pareṣāṃ parājayaṃ ca sarvadā draṣṭum iṣṭaṃ paśya mama dehe guḍākeśa yac cānyad draṣṭum icchasīti bhagavad-ādiṣṭam adhunā paśyāmīty āha amīti pañcabhiḥ /
GE07bhg4c11u:682: amī ca dhṛtarāṣṭrasya putrā duryodhana-prabhṛtayaḥ śataṃ sodarā yuyutsuṃ vinā sarve tvāṃ tvaramāṇā viśantīty agretanenānvayaḥ /
GE07bhg4c11u:684: sahaivāvanipālānāṃ khalv ādīnāṃ rājñāṃ saṃghais tvāṃ viśanti /
GE07bhg4c11u:685: na kevalaṃ duryodhanādaya eva viśanti kintu ajayatvena sarvaiḥ sambhāvito 'pi bhīṣmo
GE07bhg4c11u:686: droṇaḥ sūta-putraḥ karṇas tathāsau sarvadā mama vidveṣṭā sahāsmadīyair api parakīyair
GE07bhg4c11u:687: iva dhṛṣṭadyumna-prabhṛtibhir yodha-mukhyais tvāṃ viśantīti sambandhaḥ //26 //
GE07bhg4c11u:688: amī dhṛtarāṣṭra-putra-prabhṛtayaḥ sarve 'pi te tava daṃṣṭrā-karālāni bhayānakāni vaktrāṇi te tvaramāṇā viśanti /
GE07bhg4c11u:689: tatra ca kecic cūrṇitair uttamāṅgaiḥ śirobhir viśiṣṭā daśanāntareṣu vilagnā viśeṣeṇa saṃlagnā dṛśyante mayā samyag asandehena //27//
GE07bhg4c11u:691: baladevaḥ : yac cānyad draṣṭum icchasi ity anenāsmin yuddhe bhaviṣyaj-jaya-parājayādikaṃ ca mad-dehe paśyeti yad bhagavatoktaṃ tad adhunā paśyann āha amī ceti pañcabhiḥ /
GE07bhg4c11u:692: amī dhṛtarāṣṭrasya putrā duryodhanādayaḥ sarve 'vanipāla-saṃghaiḥ śalya-jayadrathādi-bhūpa-vṛndaiḥ saha tvaramāṇāḥ santas te vaktrāṇi viśantīty uttareṇānvayaḥ /
GE07bhg4c11u:696: na kevalaṃ ta eva kintv asmadīyā ye yodha-mukhyā dhṛṣṭadyumnādayaḥ taiḥ saheti te 'pi praviśantīti sahoktir alaṅkāraḥ /
GE07bhg4c11u:697: kecid iti teṣāṃ madhye kecic cūrṇitair uttamāṅgair mastakaiḥ sahitā daśanāntareṣu danta-sandhiṣu vilagnāḥ saṃdṛśyante mayā //26-27//
GE07bhg4c11u:704: nadīnām aneka-mārga-pravṛttānāṃ bahavo 'mbūnāṃ vārīṇāṃ vegāḥ pravāhāḥ samudrābhimukhāḥ santo yathā samudram eva dravanti viśanti /
GE07bhg4c11u:705: tathāmī ye nara-loka-vīrās te viśanti tathaiva lokā ete janā api tava mukhāni praviśanti //28//
GE07bhg4c11u:708: yathā nadīnām aneka-mārga-pravṛttānāṃ bahavo 'mbūnāṃ jalānāṃ vegāḥ vegavantaḥ pravāhāḥ
GE07bhg4c11u:709: samudrābhimukhāḥ santaḥ samudram eva dravanti viśanti tathā tavāmī nara-loka-vīrā
GE07bhg4c11u:710: viśanti vaktrāṇy abhitaḥ sarvato jvalanti abhivijvalantīti vā pāṭhaḥ //28 //
GE07bhg4c11u:712: baladevaḥ : praveśe dṛṣṭāntāv āha yatheti dvyābhyām /
GE07bhg4c11u:720: śrīdharaḥ : avaśatvena praveśe nadī-vego dṛṣṭānta uktaḥ /
GE07bhg4c11u:722: pradīptaṃ jvalanam agniṃ pataṅgāḥ śalabhā buddhi-pūrvakaṃ samṛddho vego yeṣāṃ te yathā nāśāya maraṇāyaiva viśanti tathaiva lokā ete janā api tava mukhāni praviśanti //29//
GE07bhg4c11u:724: abuddhi-pūrvaka-praveśe nadī-vegaṃ dṛṣṭāntam uktvā buddhi-pūrvaka-praveśe dṛṣṭāntam āha yatheti /
GE07bhg4c11u:725: yathā pataṅgāḥ śalabhāḥ samṛddha-vegāḥ santo buddhi-pūrvaṃ pradīptaṃ jvalanaṃ viśanti
GE07bhg4c11u:726: nāśāya maraṇāyaiva tathaiva nāśāya viśanti lokā ete duryodhana-prabhṛtayaḥ sarve
GE07bhg4c11u:742: kiṃ ca he viṣṇo tava bhāso dīptayas tejobhir visphūraṇaiḥ samagraṃ jagad vyāpya tīvrāḥ satyaḥ pratapanti santāpayanti //30//
GE07bhg4c11u:744: yoddhu-kāmānāṃ rājñāṃ bhagavan-mukha-praveśa-prakāram uktvā tadā bhagavatas tad-bhāsāṃ ca pravṛtti-prakāram āha lelihyasa iti /
GE07bhg4c11u:745: evaṃ vegena praviśato lokān duryodhanādīn samagrān sarvān grasamāno 'ntaḥ praveśayaj
GE07bhg4c11u:746: jvaladbhir vadanaiḥ samantāt sarvatas tvaṃ lelihyasa āsvādayasi tejobhir bhābhir
GE07bhg4c11u:747: āpūrya jagat samagraṃ yasmāt tvaṃ bhābhir jagad āpūrayasi tasmāt tavogrās tīvrā bhāso
GE07bhg4c11u:748: dīptayaḥ prajvalato jvalanasyeva pratapanti santāpaṃ janayanti /
GE07bhg4c11u:751: baladevaḥ : yoddhṝṇāṃ tan-mukha-praveśe prakāram uktvā tasya tad-bhāsāṃ ca tatra pravṛtti-prakāram āha lelihyasa iti /
GE07bhg4c11u:752: vegena praviśataḥ samagrān lokān duryodhanādīn jvaladbhir vadanair grasamāno gilan samantād roṣāveśena lelihasye tad-rudhirokṣitam oṣṭhādikaṃ muhur muhur lekṣi /
GE07bhg4c11u:753: tavogrā bhāso dīptayo 'sahyais tejobhiḥ samagraṃ jagad āpūrya pratapanti /
GE07bhg4c11u:767: bhavantam ādyaṃ puruṣaṃ viśeṣeṇa jñātum icchāmi /
GE07bhg4c11u:768: yatas tava pravṛttim ceṣṭāṃ kim artham evaṃ pravṛtto 'sīti na jānāmi /
GE07bhg4c11u:769: evaṃ bhūtasya tava pravṛttiṃ vārtām api na jānāmīti //31//
GE07bhg4c11u:772: evam ugra-rūpaḥ krūrākāraḥ ko bhavān ity ākhyāhi kathaya me mahyam atyantānugrāhyāya /
GE07bhg4c11u:773: ataeva namo 'stu te tubhyaṃ sarva-gurave he deva-vara prasīda prasādaṃ kraurya-tyāgaṃ kuru /
GE07bhg4c11u:774: vijñātum viśeṣeṇa jñātum icchāmi bhavantam ādyaṃ sarva-kāraṇaṃ,
GE07bhg4c11u:775: na hi yasmāt tava sakhāpi san prajānāmi tava pravṛttim ceṣṭām //31//
GE07bhg4c11u:777: baladevaḥ : evaṃ viśva-rūpaṃ vyañjita-kāla-śaktiṃ bhagavantam upavarṇya tat-tattva-vid apy arjunaḥ sva-jñāna-dārḍhyāya pṛcchati ākhyāhīti /
GE07bhg4c11u:778: darśayātmānam avyayam iti sahasra-śīrṣādi-lakṣaṇam aiśvaraṃ rūpaṃ darśayitum arthitena bhagavatā tad-rūpaṃ pradarśya tasya punar atighorā saṃhartṛtā pradarśyate /
GE07bhg4c11u:779: tatrogra-rūpo bhavān ka ity ākhyāhi kathaya /
GE07bhg4c11u:783: ādyaṃ bhavantam ahaṃ viśeṣeṇa jñātum icchāmi /
GE07bhg4c11u:784: tava pravṛttiṃ ceṣṭāṃ ca na hi prajānāmi /
GE07bhg4c11u:785: kim artham evaṃ pravṛtto 'sīti tat-prayojanaṃ cākhyāhīti //31//
GE07bhg4c11u:792: śrīdharaḥ : evam prārthitaḥ san bhagavān uvāca kāla iti tribhiḥ /
GE07bhg4c11u:794: lokān prāṇinaḥ saṃhartum iha loke pravṛtto 'smi /
GE07bhg4c11u:795: ata ṛte 'pi tvāṃ hantāraṃ vināpi na bhaviṣyanti na jīviṣyanti /
GE07bhg4c11u:796: yadyapi tvayā na hantavyā ete tathāpi mayā kālātmanā grastāḥ santo mariṣyanty eva /
GE07bhg4c11u:797: ke te ? pratyanīkeṣu anīkāni anīkāni prati /
GE07bhg4c11u:798: bhīṣma-droṇādīnāṃ sarvāsu senāsu ye yodhāro 'vasthitās te sarve 'pi //32//
GE07bhg4c11u:800: evam arjunena prārthito yaḥ svayaṃ yad-arthā ca sva-pravṛttis tat sarvaṃ tribhir ślokaiḥ kālo 'smīti /
GE07bhg4c11u:801: kālaḥ kriyā-śakty-upahitaḥ sarvasya saṃhartā parameśvaro 'smi bhavāmīdānīṃ pravṛddho vṛddhiṃ gataḥ /
GE07bhg4c11u:802: yad-arthaṃ pravṛttas tac chṛṇu lokān samāhartum bhakṣayituṃ pravṛtto 'ham ihāsmin kāle /
GE07bhg4c11u:803: mat-pravṛttiṃ vinā katham evaṃ syād iti cen nety āha /
GE07bhg4c11u:804: ṛte 'pi tvā tvām arjunaṃ yoddhāraṃ vināpi tvad-vyāpāraṃ vināpi mad-vyāpāreṇaiva na
GE07bhg4c11u:805: bhaviṣyanti vinaṅkṣyanti sarve bhīṣma-droṇa-karṇa-prabhṛtayo yoddhum anarhatvena
GE07bhg4c11u:806: sambhāvitā anye 'pi ye 'vasthitāḥ pratyanīkeṣu pratipakṣa-sainyeṣu yodhā yodhāraḥ
GE07bhg4c11u:807: sarve 'pi mayā hatatvād eva na bhaviṣyanti /
GE07bhg4c11u:810: baladevaḥ : evam arthito bhagavān uvāca kālo 'smīti /
GE07bhg4c11u:812: yasya brahma ca kṣatraṃ ca ubhe bhavata odanaḥ /
GE07bhg4c11u:813: mṛtyur yasyopasecanaṃ ka itthā veda yatra saḥ // [KaṭhU 1.2.25]
GE07bhg4c11u:814: iti śrutyā yaḥ kīrtyate sa kālo 'ham ity arthaḥ /
GE07bhg4c11u:815: iha samaye lokān duryodhanādīn samāhartuṃ grasituṃ pravṛttaṃ māṃ mat-pravṛtti-phalaṃ ca jānīhi /
GE07bhg4c11u:816: tvām api yudhiṣṭhirādīṃś ca ṛte sarve na bhaviṣyanti na jīviṣyanti /
GE07bhg4c11u:817: yad vā, nanu raṇān nivṛtte mayi teṣāṃ kathaṃ kṣayaḥ syād iti cet tatrāha ṛte 'pīti /
GE07bhg4c11u:818: tvāṃ yodhāram ṛte tvad-yuddha-vyāpāraṃ vināpi sarve na bhaviṣyanti mariṣyanty eva kālātmanā mayā teṣāṃ āyur-haraṇāt /
GE07bhg4c11u:819: ke te sarve ity āha pratyanīkeṣu paramparayor ye bhīṣmādayo 'vasthitāḥ /
GE07bhg4c11u:820: yuddhān nivṛttasya tava tu svadharma-cyutir eva bhaved iti //32//
GE07bhg4c11u:828: devair api durjayā bhīṣmādayo 'rjunena nirjitā ity evaṃ bhūtaṃ yaśo labhasva prāpnuhi /
GE07bhg4c11u:829: ayatnataś ca śatrūn jitvā samṛddhaṃ rājyam bhuṅkṣva /
GE07bhg4c11u:830: ete ca tava śatravas tvadīya-yuddhāt pūrvam eva mayaiva kālātmanā nihata-prāyāḥ /
GE07bhg4c11u:833: savyena hastena sācituṃ śarān saṃdhātuṃ śīlaṃ yasyeti vyutpattyā vāmenāpi vāṇa-kṣepāt savyasācīty ucyate //33//
GE07bhg4c11u:836: tasmāt tvad-vyāpāram antareṇāpi yasmād ete vinaṅkṣanty eva tasmāt tvam uttiṣṭhodyukto
GE07bhg4c11u:837: bhava yuddhāya devair api durjayā bhīṣma-droṇādayo 'tirathā jhaṭity evārjunena nirjitā
GE07bhg4c11u:839: mahadbhiḥ puṇyair eva hi yaśo labhyate /
GE07bhg4c11u:840: ayatnataś ca jitvā śatrūn duryodhanādīn bhuṅkṣva rājyaṃ svopasarjanatvena bhogyatāṃ prāpaya samṛddhaṃ rājyam akaṇṭakam /
GE07bhg4c11u:841: ete ca tava śatravo mayaiva kālātmanā nihatāḥ saṃhṛtāyuṣas tvadīya-yuddhāt pūrvam eva kevalaṃ tava yaśo-lābhāya rathān na pātitāḥ /
GE07bhg4c11u:842: atas tvaṃ nimitta-mātram arjunenaite nirjitā iti sārvalaukika-kavy-apadeśāspadaṃ
GE07bhg4c11u:843: bhava he savyasācin savyena vāmena hastenāpi śarān sacituṃ saṃdhātuṃ śīlaṃ yasya
GE07bhg4c11u:845: tvad-vyāpārānantaraṃ mayā rathāt pātyamāneṣv eteṣu tavaiva kartṛtvaṃ lokāḥ kalpayiṣyantīty abhiprāyaḥ //33//
GE07bhg4c11u:847: baladevaḥ : yasmād evaṃ tasmāt tvam uttiṣṭha svadharmāya yuddhāya yaśo labhasva sura-durjayā bhīṣmādayo 'rjunena helayaiva nirjitā iti durlabhāṃ kīrtiṃ prāpnuhi /
GE07bhg4c11u:848: pūrvaṃ draupadyām aparādha-samaya eva mayaite nihatās tvad-yaśase yantra-pratimāvat pravartante /
GE07bhg4c11u:851: savyenāpi hastena bāṇān sacituṃ saṃdhātuṃ śīlaṃ asyeti yuddha-nirbhare prāpte hastābhyām iṣu-varṣinn ity arthaḥ //33//
GE07bhg4c11u:853: droṇaṃ ca bhīṣmaṃ ca jayadrathaṃ ca
GE07bhg4c11u:855: mayā hatāṃs tvaṃ jahi mā vyathiṣṭhā
GE07bhg4c11u:857: śrīdharaḥ : na caite vidmaḥ kataran no garīyo yad vā jayema yadi vā no jayeyuḥ ity āśaṅkā sāpi na kāryety āha droṇam iti /
GE07bhg4c11u:858: yebhyas tvaṃ śaṅkase tān droṇādīn mayaiva hatāṃs tvaṃ jahi ghātaya /
GE07bhg4c11u:860: sapatnān śatrūn raṇe yuddhe niścitaṃ jetāsi jeṣyasi //34//
GE07bhg4c11u:862: nanu droṇo brāhmaṇottamo dhanurvedācāryo mama guru viśeṣeṇa ca divyāstra-sampannas
GE07bhg4c11u:863: tathā bhīṣmaḥ svacchanda-mṛtyur divyāstra-sampannaś ca parāśurāmeṇa dvandva-yuddham
GE07bhg4c11u:864: upagamyāpi na parājitas tathā yasya pitā vṛddha-kṣatras tapaś carati mama putrasya
GE07bhg4c11u:865: śiro yo bhūmau pātayiṣyati tasyāpi śiras tat-kālaṃ bhūmau patiṣyatīti sa jayadratho
GE07bhg4c11u:866: 'pi jetum aśakyaḥ svayam api mahādevārādhana-paro divyāstra-sampannaś ca tathā karṇo
GE07bhg4c11u:867: 'pi svayaṃ sūrya-samas tad-ārādhanena divyāstra-sampannaś ca vāsava-dattayā caika-puruṣa-ghātinyā
GE07bhg4c11u:868: moghīkartum aśakyayā śaktyā śaktyā viśiṣṭas tathā kṛpāśvatthāma-bhūriśravaḥ-prabhṛtayo
GE07bhg4c11u:869: mahānubhāvāḥ sarvathā durjayā evaiteṣu satsu kathaṃ jitvā śatrūn rājyaṃ bhokṣye kathaṃ
GE07bhg4c11u:870: vā yaśo lapsya ity āśaṅkām arjunasyāpanetum
GE07bhg4c11u:871: āha tad āśaṅkā-viṣayān nāmabhiḥ kathayan droṇam iti /
GE07bhg4c11u:872: droṇādīṃs tvad-āśaṅkā-viṣayī-bhūtān sarvān eva yodha-vīrān kālātmanā mayā hatān eva tvaṃ jahi /
GE07bhg4c11u:874: ato mā vyathiṣṭhāḥ katham evaṃ śakṣyāmīti vyathāṃ bhaya-nimittāṃ pīḍāṃ mā gā bhayaṃ tyaktvā yudhyasva /
GE07bhg4c11u:875: jetāsi jeṣyasy acireṇaiva raṇe saṅgrāme sapatnān sarvān api śatrūn /
GE07bhg4c11u:876: atra droṇaṃ ca bhīṣmaṃ ca jayadrathaṃ ceti ca-kāra-trayeṇa pūrvoktājeyatva-śaṅkānūdyate /
GE07bhg4c11u:879: tasmāt kuto 'pi svasya parājayaṃ vadha-nimittaṃ pāpaṃ ca mā śaṅkiṣṭhā ity abhiprāyaḥ /
GE07bhg4c11u:880: kathaṃ bhīṣmam ahaṃ saṅkhye droṇaṃ ca madhusūdana /
GE07bhg4c11u:881: iṣubhiḥ pratiyotsyāmi pūjārhau ity atrevātrāpi samudāyānvayān antaraṃ pratyekānvayo draṣṭavyaḥ //34//
GE07bhg4c11u:883: baladevaḥ : yad vā jayema yadi vā no jayeyuḥ iti sva-vijaye saṃśayam ākārṣīr ity āśayenāha droṇaṃ ceti /
GE07bhg4c11u:884: mayā hatān hatāyuṣo droṇādīṃs tvaṃ jahi māraya /
GE07bhg4c11u:886: katham etān divyāstra-sampannān ekaḥ śaknomy ahaṃ vijetum iti bhayaṃ mā gāḥ /
GE07bhg4c11u:887: mṛtānāṃ māraṇe kaḥ śrama ity arthaḥ /
GE07bhg4c11u:888: bhayaṃ hitvā yudhyasva raṇa sapatnān ripūn jetāsi jeṣyasi //34//
GE07bhg4c11u:895: śrīdharaḥ : tato yad vṛttaṃ tad eva dhṛtarāṣṭraṃ prati saṃjaya uvāca etad iti /
GE07bhg4c11u:896: etat pūrva-śloka-trayātmakaṃ keśavasya vacanaṃ śrutvā vepamānaḥ kampamānaḥ kirīṭy arjunaḥ kṛtāñjaliḥ sampuṭīkṛta-hastaḥ kṛṣṇaṃ namaskṛtya punar apy āhoktavān /
GE07bhg4c11u:897: katham āha ? harṣa-bhayādy-āveśa-vaśāt gadgadena kaṇṭha-kampanena saha vartate iti sa-gadgadaṃ yathā syāt tathā /
GE07bhg4c11u:898: kiṃ ca bhītād api bhītaḥ san praṇamyāvanato bhūtvā //35//
GE07bhg4c11u:900: droṇa-bhīṣma-jayadratha-karṇeṣu jayāśā-viṣayeṣu hateṣu nirāśrayo duryodhano hata
GE07bhg4c11u:901: evety anusandhāya jayāśāṃ parityajya yadi dhṛtarāṣṭraḥ sandhiṃ kuryāt tadā śāntir
GE07bhg4c11u:902: ubhayeṣāṃ bhaved ity abhiprāyavāṃs tataḥ kiṃ vṛttam ity apekṣāyāṃ saṃjaya uvāca etad iti /
GE07bhg4c11u:903: etat pūrvoktaṃ keśavasya vacanaṃ śrutvā kṛtāñjaliḥ kirīṭīndra-datta-kirīṭaḥ parama-vīratvena
GE07bhg4c11u:904: prasiddho vepamānaḥ paramāścarya-darśana-janitena sambhrameṇa kampamāno 'rjunaḥ kṛṣṇaṃ
GE07bhg4c11u:905: bhaktāgha-karṣaṇaṃ bhagavantaṃ namaskṛtvā namaskṛtya bhūyaḥ punar apy āhoktavān sa-gadgadaṃ
GE07bhg4c11u:906: bhayena harṣeṇa cāśru-pūrṇa-netratve sati kapha-ruddha-kaṇṭhatayā vāco mandatva-sakampatvādir
GE07bhg4c11u:909: pūrvaṃ namaskṛtya punar api praṇamyātyanta-namro bhūtvāheti sambandhaḥ //35//
GE07bhg4c11u:912: baladevaḥ : tato yad abhūt tat saṃjaya uvāca etad iti /
GE07bhg4c11u:913: keśavasyaitat padya-trayātmakaṃ vacanaṃ śrutvā kirīṭī pārthaḥ vepamāno 'tyadbhutātyugra-rūpa-darśanajena sambhrameṇa sakampaḥ /
GE07bhg4c11u:917: bhīta-bhīto 'tibhayākulaḥ san bhūyaḥ punaar apy āha sa-gadgadaṃ gadgadena kaṇṭha-kampena sahitaṃ yathā syāt tathā //35//
GE07bhg4c11u:925: sthāne ity avyayaṃ yuktam ity asminn arthe /
GE07bhg4c11u:926: he hṛṣīkeśa yata evaṃ tvam adbhuta-prabhāvo bhakta-vatsalaś ca /
GE07bhg4c11u:927: atas tava prakīrtyā māhātmya-saṅkīrtanena na kevalam aham eva prahṛṣyāmīti,
GE07bhg4c11u:928: kintu jagat sarvaṃ prahṛṣyaty prakarṣeṇa harṣaṃ prāpnoti /
GE07bhg4c11u:929: etat tu sthāne yuktam ity arthaḥ /
GE07bhg4c11u:930: tathā jagad anurajyate cānurāgam upaitīti yat /
GE07bhg4c11u:932: diśaḥ prati dravanti palāyante iti yat /
GE07bhg4c11u:933: sarve yoga-tapo-mantrādi-siddhānāṃ saṅghā namasyanti praṇamanti iti yat /
GE07bhg4c11u:938: sthāna ity avyayaṃ yuktam ity arthe /
GE07bhg4c11u:940: sarvendriya-pravartaka yatas tvam evam atyantādbhuta-prabhāvo bhakta-vatsalaś ca
GE07bhg4c11u:941: tatas tava prakīrtyā prakṛṣṭayā kīrtyā niratiśaya-prāśastyasya kīrtanena śravaṇena
GE07bhg4c11u:942: ca na kevalam aham eva prahṛṣyāmi kintu sarvam eva jagac cetana-mātraṃ rakṣo-virodhi
GE07bhg4c11u:943: prahṛṣyati prakṛṣṭaṃ harṣam āpnotīti yat tat sthāne yuktam evety arthaḥ /
GE07bhg4c11u:944: tathā sarvaṃ jagad anurajyate ca tad-viṣayam anurāgam upaitīti ca yat tad api yuktam eva /
GE07bhg4c11u:945: tathā rakṣāṃsi bhītāni bhayāviṣṭāni santi diśo dravanti gacchanti sarvāsu dikṣu palāyanta iti yat tad api yuktam eva /
GE07bhg4c11u:946: tathā sarve siddhānāṃ kapilādīnāṃ saṃghā namasyanti ceti yat tad api yuktam eva /
GE07bhg4c11u:947: sarvatra tava prakīrtyety asyānvayaḥ sthāna ity asya ca /
GE07bhg4c11u:950: sa ca nārāyaṇāṣṭākṣara-sudarśanāstra-mantrābhyāṃ sampuṭito jñeya iti rahasyam //36//
GE07bhg4c11u:952: bhagavad-vigrahasyātiprasannatvam atighoratvaṃ cedam unmukha-vimukha-viṣayakam iti sahaseva jñātvā tad eva tattvaṃ vyācakṣaṇaḥ stauti sthāna iti /
GE07bhg4c11u:953: sthāna ity avyayaṃ yuktam ity arthaḥ /
GE07bhg4c11u:955: sva-bhaktendriyānāṃ ca svābhimukhye sva-mukhye ca pravartaka /
GE07bhg4c11u:956: tava prakīrtyā prakṛṣṭayā tvan-māhātmya-saṅkīrtanena jagad idaṃ prahṛṣyay anurajyate anuraktam bhavatīti yuktam eva jagato 'sya tvad-aunmukhyād iti bhāvaḥ /
GE07bhg4c11u:957: tathā rakṣāṃsi rakṣo 'sura-dānava-piśācādīni bhītāni bhūtvā diśo dravanti diśaḥ prati palāyanta ity etad api sthāne yuktam eva /
GE07bhg4c11u:959: tathā tvad-bhaktyā ye siddhās teṣāṃ saṅghāḥ sarve namasyanti cety api yuktam eva /
GE07bhg4c11u:962: baladevaḥ : pareśasya sakhyuḥ kṛṣṇasyātiramyatvam atyugratvaṃ ca tatra raṅgavad yugapad
GE07bhg4c11u:963: eva vīkṣya tad-ubhayaṃ sva-saṃmukha-sva-vimukha-viṣayam iti vidvān arjunas tad-anurūpaṃ
GE07bhg4c11u:965: yuktam ity arthakaṃ sthāna ity ed-antam avyayam /
GE07bhg4c11u:966: he hṛṣīkeśeti saṃmukha-vimukhendriyāṇāṃ sāṃmukhye vaimukhye capravarakety arthaḥ /
GE07bhg4c11u:967: yuddha-darśanāyāgataṃ deva-gandharva-siddha-vidyādhara-pramukhaṃ tvat-saṃmukhaṃ jagat tava duṣṭa-saṃhartatva-rūpayā prakīrtyā prahṛṣyaty anurajyate ceti yuktam etat /
GE07bhg4c11u:968: duṣṭa-svabhāvāni tvad-vimukhāni rakṣāṃsi rākṣasāsura-dānavādīni devādy-udgītayā tat-prakīrtyā bhītāni bhūtvā diśaḥ prati dravanti palāyanta iti ca yuktam /
GE07bhg4c11u:971: tava vīkṣya tvad-bhaktāḥ siddha-saṅghāḥ sarve sanakādayo namasyanti jaya jaya bhagavān ity udīrayantaḥ praṇamanti ca yuktaṃ tava bhakta-mano-hāritvāt
GE07bhg4c11u:973: kasmāc ca te na nameran mahātman
GE07bhg4c11u:976: tvam akṣaraṃ sad asat tatparaṃ yat //37//
GE07bhg4c11u:977: śrīdharaḥ : tatra hetum āha kasmād iti /
GE07bhg4c11u:982: kasmād dhetos te tubhyaṃ na nameran na namaskāraṃ kuryuḥ ?
GE07bhg4c11u:985: kiṃ ca sad vyaktam asad-vyaktaṃ tābhyāṃ paraṃ mūla-kāraṇaṃ yad akṣaraṃ brahma /
GE07bhg4c11u:987: etair navabhir hetubhis tvāṃ sarve namasyantīti na citram ity arthaḥ //37//
GE07bhg4c11u:989: bhagavato harṣādi-viṣayatve hetum āha kasmāc ceti /
GE07bhg4c11u:990: kasmāc ca hetos te tubhyaṃ na nameran na namaskuryuḥ siddha-saṅghāḥ sarve 'pi /
GE07bhg4c11u:993: he deveśa hiraṇyagarbhādīnām api devānāṃ niyantaḥ /
GE07bhg4c11u:995: tubhyaṃ kīdṛśāya brahmaṇo 'pi garīyase gurutarāyādi-kartre tvam brahmaṇo 'pi janakāya /
GE07bhg4c11u:996: niyantṛtvam upadeṣṭṛtvaṃ janakatvam ity ādir ekaiko 'pi hetur namaskāryatā-prayojakaḥ
GE07bhg4c11u:999: kiṃ ca sat ? vidhi-mukhena pratīyamānam astīit /
GE07bhg4c11u:1003: tābhyāṃ sad-asadbhyāṃ paraṃ mūla-kāraṇaṃ yad akṣaraṃ brahma tad api tvam eva tvad-bhinnaṃ kim api nāstīty arthaḥ /
GE07bhg4c11u:1004: tat-paraṃ yad ity atra yac-chabdāt prāk-ca-kāram api kecit paṭhanti /
GE07bhg4c11u:1005: etair hetubhis tvāṃ sarve namasyantīti na kim api citram ity arthaḥ //37//
GE07bhg4c11u:1010: sat-kāryam asat-kāraṇaṃ ca tābhyāṃ paraṃ yad akṣaraṃ brahma tat tvam //37//
GE07bhg4c11u:1011: baladevaḥ : atha bhagavataḥ sarva-namasyatvam abhidadhat sarva-vyāpitvāt sarvātmakatāṃ pratipādayati kasmāc ceti caturbhiḥ /
GE07bhg4c11u:1016: te siddha-saṅghās te tubhyaṃ kasmād dhetor na nameran ?
GE07bhg4c11u:1020: brahmaṇo 'py garīyase gurutarāya yasmād ādi-kartre tattva-sṛṣṭi-karāyeti namasyatve 'neke hetavaḥ santīti samuccayālaṅkāraḥ /
GE07bhg4c11u:1021: kiṃ ca yad akṣaraṃ prakṛti-tattvaṃ tat-paraṃ yad iti /
GE07bhg4c11u:1022: tasmāt prakṛti-saṃsṛṣṭāj jīvātma-tattvāt prakṛti-tattvāc cokta-rūpāt param utkṛṣṭaṃ bhinnaṃ ca yan-mukta-jīvātma-tattvaṃ tac ca tvam eva sarva-rūpa ity arthaḥ //37//
GE07bhg4c11u:1026: vettāsi vedyaṃ ca paraṃ ca dhāma
GE07bhg4c11u:1028: śrīdharaḥ : kiṃ ca tvam ādi-deva iti /
GE07bhg4c11u:1031: ataeva tvam asya paraṃ nidhānam laya-sthānam /
GE07bhg4c11u:1033: yac ca vedyaṃ vastu-jātaṃ paraṃ ca dhāma vaiṣṇavaṃ padaṃ tad api tvam evāsi /
GE07bhg4c11u:1034: ataeva he ananta-rūpa tvayaivedaṃ viśvaṃ tataṃ vyāptam /
GE07bhg4c11u:1035: etaiś ca saptabhir hetubhis tvam eva namaskārya ity arthaḥ //38//
GE07bhg4c11u:1037: bhakty-udrekāt punar api stauti tvam iti /
GE07bhg4c11u:1041: tvam asya viśvasya paraṃ nidhānam laya-sthānatvān nidhīyate sarvam asminn iti /
GE07bhg4c11u:1042: evaṃ sṛṣṭi-pralaya-sthānatvenopādānatvam uktvā sarvajñatvena pradhānaṃ vyāvartayan nimittatām āha vettā veditā sarvasyāsi /
GE07bhg4c11u:1043: dvaitāpattiṃ vārayati yac ca vedyaṃ tad api tvam evāsi vedana-rūpe veditari paramārtha-sambandhābhāvena sarvasya vedyasya kalpitatvāt /
GE07bhg4c11u:1044: ataeva paraṃ ca dhāma yat sac-cid-ānanda-ghanam avidyā-tat-kārya-nirmuktaṃ viṣṇoḥ paramaṃ padaṃ tad api tvam evāsi /
GE07bhg4c11u:1045: tvayā sad-rūpeṇa sphūraṇa-rūpeṇa ca kāraṇena tataṃ vyāptam idaṃ svataḥ-sattā-sphūrti-śūnyaṃ viśvam kāryaṃ māyika-sambandhenaiva sthiti-kāla he 'nantarūpāparicchinna-svarūpa //38//
GE07bhg4c11u:1047: nidhānaṃ laya-sthānaṃ paraṃ dhāma guṇātītaṃ svarūpam //38//
GE07bhg4c11u:1049: paraṃ nidhānam paramāśrayo nidhīyate 'smin iti nirukteḥ /
GE07bhg4c11u:1050: jagati yo vettā yac ca vedyaṃ tad ubhayaṃ tvam eva /
GE07bhg4c11u:1051: kuta evam iti cet tatrāha yat tvayā viśvam idaṃ tataṃ tad-vyāpitvād ity arthaḥ /
GE07bhg4c11u:1052: yac ca paraṃ dhāma parama-vyomākhyaṃ prāpya-sthānam tad api tvam eva parākhya-tvac-chakti-vaibhavatvāt tasya dhāmnaḥ //38//
GE07bhg4c11u:1057: punaś ca bhūyo 'pi namo namas te //39//
GE07bhg4c11u:1058: śrīdharaḥ : itaś ca sarvais tvam eva namaskāryaḥ sarva-devātmakatvād iti stuvan svayam api namaskaroti vāyur iti /
GE07bhg4c11u:1064: bhūyo 'pi punar api sahasra-kṛtvo namo nama iti //39//
GE07bhg4c11u:1066: vāyur yamo 'gnir varuṇaḥ śaśāṅkaḥ sūryādīnām apy upalakṣaṇam etat /
GE07bhg4c11u:1068: prapitāmahaś pitāmahasya hiraṇya-garbhasyāpi pitā ca tvam /
GE07bhg4c11u:1069: yasmād evaṃ sarva-devātmakatvāt tvam eva sarvair namaskāryo 'si tasmān mamāpi varākasya namo namo namas te tubhyam astu sahasrakṛtvaḥ /
GE07bhg4c11u:1070: punaś ca bhūyo 'pi punar api ca namo namas te /
GE07bhg4c11u:1073: baladevaḥ : ataḥ sarva-śabda-vācyas tvam ity āha vāyur iti /
GE07bhg4c11u:1074: sarva-devopalakṣaṇaṃ vāyv-ādi-sarva-deva-rūpas tvaṃ prajāpatiś caturāsyaḥ pitāmahas
GE07bhg4c11u:1075: tvaṃ tat-pitṛtvāt prapitāmahas tvaṃ bhavasi kaṅkaṇādiṣu kanakasyeva cid-acic-chaktimatas
GE07bhg4c11u:1076: tava kāraṇasya vāyv-ādiṣu vyāptes tat tat sarva-rūpas tvam ataḥ sarva-namasyo 'sīti
GE07bhg4c11u:1077: mayā tvaṃ namasyase ity āha namo namaḥ //39 //
GE07bhg4c11u:1083: śrīdharaḥ : bhakti-śraddhābhayātiśayena namaskāreṣu tṛptim anadhigacchan punar api bahuśaḥ praṇamati nama iti /
GE07bhg4c11u:1084: he sarva sarvātman sarvāsu dikṣu tubhyaṃ namo 'stu /
GE07bhg4c11u:1085: sarvātmakam upapādayann āha anantaṃ vīryaṃ sāmarthyaṃ yasya tathā /
GE07bhg4c11u:1087: evaṃ bhūtas tvaṃ sarvaṃ viśvaṃ samyag antar bahiś ca samāpnoṣi vyāpnoṣi /
GE07bhg4c11u:1088: suvarṇam iva kaṭaka-kuṇḍalādi sva-kāryaṃ vyāpya vartase tataḥ sarva-svarūpo 'si //40//
GE07bhg4c11u:1090: tubhyaṃ purastād agra-bhāge namo 'stu tubhyaṃ puro namaḥ syād iti vā /
GE07bhg4c11u:1093: namo 'stu te tubhyaṃ sarvata eva sarvāsu dikṣu sthitāya he sarva /
GE07bhg4c11u:1095: ekaṃ vīryādhikaṃ manya uttaikaṃ śikṣayādhikam ity ukter bhīma-duryodhanayor anyeṣu caikaikaṃ vyavasthitam /
GE07bhg4c11u:1096: tvaṃ tu ananta-vīryaś cāmita-vikramaś ceti samastam ekaṃ padam /
GE07bhg4c11u:1098: sarvaṃ samastaṃ jagat samāpnoṣi samyag ekenaa sad-rūpeṇāpnoṣi sarvātmanā vyāpnoṣi tatas tasmāt sarvo 'si tvad-atiriktaṃ kim api nāstīty arthaḥ
GE07bhg4c11u:1100: sarvaṃ sva-kāryaṃ jagad āpnoṣi vyāpnoṣi svarṇam iva kaṭaka-kuṇḍalādikam atas tvam eva sarvaḥ //40//
GE07bhg4c11u:1101: baladevaḥ : bhakty-atiśayena namaskāreṣv alaṃ bhāvam avidan bahukṛtvaḥ praṇamati namaḥ purastād iti /
GE07bhg4c11u:1103: purastāt pṛṣṭhataḥ sarvataś ca sthitāya te namo namo 'stu /
GE07bhg4c11u:1105: vīryaṃ deha-balaṃ vikramas tu dhī-balaṃ śastra-prayogādi-prāvīṇya-rūpam /
GE07bhg4c11u:1106: ekaṃ vīryādhikaṃ manyataikaṃ śikṣayādhikam iti bhīma-duryodhanāv uddiśyokteḥ /
GE07bhg4c11u:1110: sa tvam eva jagat-sraṣṭā yataḥ sarva-gato bhavān // iti //40//
GE07bhg4c11u:1113: he kṛṣṇa he yādava he sakheti /
GE07bhg4c11u:1120: śrīdharaḥ : idānīṃ bhagavantaṃ kṣamāpayati sakhetīti dvyābhyām /
GE07bhg4c11u:1121: tvaṃ prākṛteḥ sakhety evaṃ matvā prasabhaṃ haṭhāt tiraskāreṇa yad uktaṃ tat kṣāmaye tvām ity uttareṇānvayaḥ /
GE07bhg4c11u:1122: kiṃ tat ? he kṛṣṇa he yādava he sakheti ca /
GE07bhg4c11u:1124: prasabhoktau hetuḥ - tava mahimānaṃ idaṃ ca viśva-rūpam ajānatā ca mayā pramādāt praṇayena snehena yad uktam iti //41//
GE07bhg4c11u:1129: sakhīn vinā rahasi sthita ity arthaḥ /
GE07bhg4c11u:1130: athavā tat-samakṣaṃ teṣāṃ parihasatāṃ sakhīnāṃ samakṣaṃ purato 'pi /
GE07bhg4c11u:1131: tat sarvam aparādha-jātaṃ tvām aprameyam acintya-prabhāvaṃ kṣāmaye kṣamāṃ kārayāmi //42//
GE07bhg4c11u:1133: yato 'haṃ tvan-māhātmyāparijñānād aparādhān ajasrām akārṣaṃ tataḥ parama-kāruṇikaṃ tvāṃ praṇamyāparādha-kṣamāṃ kāryāmītyāha sakhetīti dvābhyām
GE07bhg4c11u:1134: tvaṃ mama sakhā samāna-vayā iti matvā prasabhaṃ svotkarṣa-khyāpana-rūpeṇābhibhavena yad uktaṃ mayā tavedaṃ viśva-rūpaṃ tathā mahimānam aiśvaryātiśayam ajānatā /
GE07bhg4c11u:1136: pramādāc citta-vikṣepāt praṇayena snehena vāpi kim uktam ity āha he kṛṣṇa he yādava he sakheti //41//
GE07bhg4c11u:1137: yac cāvahāsārtham parihāsārthaṃ vihāra-śayyāsana-bhojaneṣu vihāraḥ krīḍā vyāyāmo vā,
GE07bhg4c11u:1140: bhojanaṃ bahūnāṃ paṅkāvaśanaṃ teṣu viṣaya-bhūteṣu asatkṛto 'si mayā paribhūto 'si ekaḥ sakhīn vihāya rahasi sthito vā tvam /
GE07bhg4c11u:1141: athavā tat-samakṣaṃ teṣāṃ sakhīnāṃ samakṣaṃ vā, he 'cyuta /
GE07bhg4c11u:1143: tat sarvaṃ vacana-rūpam asat-karaṇa-rūpaṃ cāparādha-jātaṃ kṣāmaye kṣāmayāmi tvām
GE07bhg4c11u:1144: aprameyam acintya-prabhāveṇa nirvikāreṇa ca parama-kāruṇikena bhagavatā tvan-māhātmyānabhijñasya
GE07bhg4c11u:1147: hanta hantaitādṛśa-mahā-mahaiśvaryamat tvayy ahaṃ kṛta-mahāparādha-puñjo 'smīty anutāpam āviṣkurvann āha sakhetīti /
GE07bhg4c11u:1149: tvaṃ vasudeva-nāmno narasyārdharathatvenāpy aprasiddhasya putraḥ kṛṣṇa iti prasiddhaḥ /
GE07bhg4c11u:1155: tad api tvayā saha mama yat sakhyaṃ tatra tava paitrika-prabhāvo na hetuḥ /
GE07bhg4c11u:1157: kintu tāvaka evety abhiprāyato yeat prasabhaṃ sa-tiraskāram uktaṃ mayā tat kṣāmaye kṣamayāmīty uttareṇānvayaḥ /
GE07bhg4c11u:1158: tavedaṃ viśva-rūpātmakaṃ svarūpam eva mahimānaṃ pramādād vā praṇayena snehena vā
GE07bhg4c11u:1159: parihāsārthaṃ vihārādiṣv asatkṛto 'si tvaṃ satyavādī niṣkapaṭaḥ parama-sarala ity-ādi-vakroktyā
GE07bhg4c11u:1162: athavā tat samakṣaṃ teṣāṃ parihasatāṃ sakhīnāṃ samakṣaṃ purato 'si yadā sthitas tadā jātaṃ tat sarvam aparādha-sahasraṃ kṣāmaye /
GE07bhg4c11u:1165: baladevaḥ : evam arjunaḥ sahasra-śīrṣādi-lakṣaṇaṃ sva-sakhaṃ kṛṣṇaṃ vilokya saṃstutya praṇamya ca sva-sakhyasyaiśvarya-jñāna-saṃmiśratvāt tad-anurūpam anunayati sakheti dvābhyām /
GE07bhg4c11u:1166: kṛṣṇo bhagavān me sakhā mitram iti matvā niścitya tavedaṃ sahasra-śīrṣatvādi-lakṣaṇaṃ
GE07bhg4c11u:1167: mahimānam ajānatānanubhavatā mayā pramādād anavadhānataḥ praṇayena sakhya-premṇā
GE07bhg4c11u:1168: vā yat tvāṃ prati prasabhaṃ haṭhād uktam /
GE07bhg4c11u:1170: kiṃ tad iti cet tatrāha he kṛṣṇety ādi /
GE07bhg4c11u:1172: etāni trīṇi sambodhanāny anādara-garbhāṇi he kṛṣṇety atra śrī-pūrvakatvābhāvāt /
GE07bhg4c11u:1175: kiṃ ca, yac ca vihārādiṣv avahāsārthaṃ parihāsāyāsatkṛto
GE07bhg4c11u:1176: 'si satya-vāk saralo niṣkapaṭas tvam ity evaṃ vyañjaka-śabdair avajñāto 'si /
GE07bhg4c11u:1177: ekaḥ sakhīn vinā vijane sthitas tat samakṣaṃ vā teṣāṃ parihasatāṃ sakhīnāṃ purato vā sthita ity arthaḥ /
GE07bhg4c11u:1178: tat sarva-vacana-rūpam asatkāra-rūpaṃ vāparādha-jātaṃ kṣāmaye kṣamasva prabho bhagavann ity anunayāmi /
GE07bhg4c11u:1179: he acyuteti saty apy aparādhe 'vicyuta-sakhety arthaḥ /
GE07bhg4c11u:1183: tvam asya pūjyaś ca gurur garīyān /
GE07bhg4c11u:1187: na vidyate pratimā upamā yasya so 'pratimaḥ /
GE07bhg4c11u:1188: tathāvidhaḥ prabhāvo yasya tava he apratima-prabhāva /
GE07bhg4c11u:1189: tvam asya carācarasya lokasya pitā janako 'si /
GE07bhg4c11u:1190: ataeva pūjyaś ca guruś ca guror api garīyān gurutaraḥ /
GE07bhg4c11u:1191: ato loka-traye 'pi na tvat-sama eva tāvad-anyo nāsti /
GE07bhg4c11u:1196: asya carācarasya lokasya pitā janakas tvam asi /
GE07bhg4c11u:1200: ataeva na tvat-samo 'sty abhyadhikaḥ kuto 'nyo loka-traye 'pi /
GE07bhg4c11u:1202: yasya samo 'pi nāsti dvitīyasya parameśvarasyābhāvāt tasyādhiko 'nyaḥ kutaḥ syāt sarvathā na sambhāvyata evety arthaḥ //43//
GE07bhg4c11u:1205: asya lokasya pitā pūjyo guruḥ śāstropadeṣṭā ca tvam asi /
GE07bhg4c11u:1206: ataḥ sarvaiḥ prakārair garīyān gurutaras tvam /
GE07bhg4c11u:1208: ato 'smin loka-traye nikhile 'pi jagati tvat-sama eva nāsti /
GE07bhg4c11u:1209: dvitīyasya pareśasyābhāvād eva tvad-adhiko 'nyaḥ kutaḥ syāt ?
GE07bhg4c11u:1210: śrutiś caivam āha na tat-samaś cābhyadhikaś ca dṛśyate iti //43//
GE07bhg4c11u:1222: atas tvaṃ mahāparādhaṃ soḍhuṃ kṣantum arhati /
GE07bhg4c11u:1226: priyaś ca priyāyā aparādhaṃ tat-priyārthaṃ yathā sahate tadvat //44//
GE07bhg4c11u:1229: tasmāt praṇamya namaskṛtya tvāṃ praṇidhāya prakarṣeṇa nīcair dhṛtvā kāyaṃ daṇḍavad bhūmau patitveti yāvat /
GE07bhg4c11u:1230: prasādaye tvām īśam īḍyam sarva-stutyam aham aparādhī /
GE07bhg4c11u:1232: piteva putrasyāparādhaṃ sakheva sakhyur aparādhaṃ priyaḥ priyāyāḥ pativratāyā aparādhaṃ mamāparādhaṃ tvaṃ soḍhum kṣantum arhasi ananya-śaraṇatvān mama /
GE07bhg4c11u:1235: kāyaṃ praṇidhāya bhūmau daṇḍavan nipātya priyāyārhasīti sandhir ārṣaḥ //44//
GE07bhg4c11u:1237: kāyaṃ bhūmau praṇidhāya praṇamyeti sāṣṭāṅgaṃ praṇatiṃ kṛtvā /
GE07bhg4c11u:1241: sakheva sakhyur iti tu tadā mahaiśvaryaṃ vīkṣya svasmin dāsatva-mananāt /
GE07bhg4c11u:1246: tad eva me darśaya deva rūpaṃ
GE07bhg4c11u:1248: śrīdharaḥ : evaṃ kṣamāpayitvā prārthayate adṛṣṭa-pūrvam iti dvābhyām /
GE07bhg4c11u:1249: he deva pūrvam adṛṣṭaṃ tava rūpaṃ dṛṣṭvā hṛṣito hṛṣṭo 'smi /
GE07bhg4c11u:1250: tathā bhayena ca me manaḥ pravyathitaṃ pracalitam /
GE07bhg4c11u:1251: tasmān mama vyathā-nivṛntaye tad eva rūpaṃ darśaya /
GE07bhg4c11u:1252: he devaśa he jagannivāsa prasanno bhava //45//
GE07bhg4c11u:1254: evam aparādha-kṣamāṃ prārthya punaḥ prāg-rūpa-darśanaṃ viśvarūpopasaṃhareṇa prārthayate adṛṣṭa-pūrvam iti dvābhyām /
GE07bhg4c11u:1255: kadāpy adṛṣṭa-pūrvaṃ pūrvam adṛṣṭaṃ viśva-rūpaṃ dṛṣṭvā hṛṣito hṛṣṭo 'smi /
GE07bhg4c11u:1256: tad-vikṛta-rūpa-darśanajena bhayena ca pravyathitaṃ vyākulīkṛtaṃ mano me /
GE07bhg4c11u:1257: atas tad eva prācīnam eva mama prāṇāpekṣayāpi priyaṃ rūpaṃ me darśaya he deva he deveśa he jagan-nivāsa prasīda prāg-rūpa-darśana-rūpaṃ prasādaṃ me kuru //45//
GE07bhg4c11u:1259: yadyapy adṛṣṭa-pūrvam idaṃ te viśva-rūpātmakaṃ vapur dṛṣṭvā hṛṣito 'smi tad apy asya ghoratvād bhayena manaḥ pravyathitam abhūt /
GE07bhg4c11u:1260: tasmāt tad eva mānuṣaṃ rūpaṃ mat-prāṇa-koṭy-adhika-priyaṃ mādhurya-pārāvāraṃ vasudeva-nandanākāraṃ me darśaya prasīdety alaṃ tavaitādṛśaiśvaryasya darśanāyeti bhāvaḥ /
GE07bhg4c11u:1261: deveśeti tvaṃ sarvedvānām īśvaraḥ sarva-jagan-nivāso bhavasy eveti mayā pratītam iti bhāvaḥ /
GE07bhg4c11u:1262: atra viśva-rūpa-darśana-kāle sarva-svarūpa-mūla-bhūtaṃ narākāraṃ kṛṣṇa-vapus tatraiva sthitam api yogamāyācchāditatvād arjunena na dṛṣṭam iti gamyate //45//
GE07bhg4c11u:1263: baladevaḥ : atha kiṃ vakṣi kiṃ cecchasīti cet tatrāha adṛṣṭeti /
GE07bhg4c11u:1264: tvayi kṛṣṇe sattvena jñātam apīdam aiśvaraṃ rūpaṃ dṛṣṭvāhaṃ harṣito 'smi mat-sakhasyedam
GE07bhg4c11u:1265: asādhāraṇaṃ rūpam iti mudito 'smi manaś ca mama tad-ghoratva-darśana-jena bhayena
GE07bhg4c11u:1267: ata idaṃ prārthayed evety ādi sarva-deva-niyantā tat-sarvādhāraḥ pareśas tvam asīti
GE07bhg4c11u:1268: mayā pratyakṣīkṛtam ataḥparaṃ tad-antarbhāvya tad eva mad-abhīṣṭaṃ kṛṣṇa-rūpaṃ darśaya
GE07bhg4c11u:1275: śrīdharaḥ : tad eva rūpaṃ viśeṣayann āha kirīṭinam iti /
GE07bhg4c11u:1276: kirīṭavantam gadāvantaṃ cakra-hastaṃ ca tvāṃ draṣṭum icchāmi /
GE07bhg4c11u:1280: idaṃ viśva-rūpam upasaṃhṛtya tenaiva kirīṭādi-yuktena caturbhujena bhavāvirbhava /
GE07bhg4c11u:1281: tad anena śrī-kṛṣṇam arjunaḥ pūrvam api kirīṭādi-yuktam eva paśyatīti gamyate /
GE07bhg4c11u:1282: yat tu pūrvam uktaṃ viśva-rūpa-darśane kirīṭinaṃ gadinaṃ cakriṇaṃ ca paśyāmīti /
GE07bhg4c11u:1284: yad vā etāvantaṃ kālaṃ yaṃ tvāṃ kirīṭinaṃ gadinaṃ cakriṇaṃ ca suprasannam apaśyaṃ tam evedānīṃ tejo-rāśiṃ durnirīkṣyaṃ paśyāmībhy evam atra vacanasya vyaktir ity avirodhaḥ //46//
GE07bhg4c11u:1286: tad eva rūpaṃ vivṛṇoti kirīṭinam iti /
GE07bhg4c11u:1287: kirīṭavantam gadāvantaṃ cakra-hastaṃ ca tvāṃ draṣṭum icchāmy ahaṃ tathaiva pūrvavad eva /
GE07bhg4c11u:1288: atas tenaiva rūpeṇa catur-bhujena vasudevātmajatvena bhava he idānīṃ sahasra-bāho he viśva-mūrte /
GE07bhg4c11u:1289: upasaṃhṛtya viśvarūpaṃ pūrva-rūpeṇaiva prakaṭo bhavety arthaḥ /
GE07bhg4c11u:1290: etena sarvadā caturbhujādi-rūpam arjunena bhagavato dṛśyata ity uktam //46//
GE07bhg4c11u:1293: kirīṭavantam gadāvantaṃ cakra-hastaṃ ca tvāṃ draṣṭum icchāmi /
GE07bhg4c11u:1297: idaṃ viśva-rūpam upasaṃhṛtya tenaiva kirīṭādi-yuktena caturbhujena bhavāvirbhava /
GE07bhg4c11u:1298: tad anena śrī-kṛṣṇam arjunaḥ pūrvam api kirīṭādi-yuktam eva paśyatīti gamyate /
GE07bhg4c11u:1299: yat tu pūrvam uktaṃ viśva-rūpa-darśane kirīṭinaṃ gadinaṃ cakriṇaṃ ca paśyāmīti /
GE07bhg4c11u:1301: yad vā etāvantaṃ kālaṃ yaṃ tvāṃ kirīṭinaṃ gadinaṃ cakriṇaṃ ca suprasannam apaśyaṃ tam evedānīṃ tejo-rāśiṃ durnirīkṣyaṃ paśyāmībhy evam atra vacanasya vyaktir ity avirodhaḥ //46//
GE07bhg4c11u:1302: baladevaḥ : tat kīdṛg ity āha kirīṭinam iti /
GE07bhg4c11u:1305: idaṃ rūpam antarbhāvya divyābhinetṛ-naṭavat tenaiva caturbhujena rūpeṇa viśiṣṭaḥ san prādurbhava //46//
GE07bhg4c11u:1311: ādyaṃ yan me tvad-anyena na dṛṣṭa-pūrvam //47//
GE07bhg4c11u:1312: śrīdharaḥ : evaṃ prārthitas tam āśvāsayan bhagavān uvāca mayeti tribhiḥ /
GE07bhg4c11u:1313: he arjuna kim iti tvaṃ bibheṣi ?
GE07bhg4c11u:1314: yato mayā prasannena kṛpayā tavedaṃ param uttamaṃ rūpaṃ darśitam /
GE07bhg4c11u:1319: yan mama rūpaṃ tvad-anyena tvādṛśād bhaktād anyena pūrvaṃ na dṛṣṭaṃ tat //47//
GE07bhg4c11u:1321: evam arjunena prasādito bhaya-vādhitam arjunam upalabhyopasaṃhṛtya viśva-rūpam ucitena vacanena tam āśvāsayan śrī-bhagavān uvāca mayeti tribhiḥ
GE07bhg4c11u:1323: yato mayā prasannena tvad-viṣaya-kṛpātiśayavatedaṃ viśva-rūpātmakaṃ paraṃ śreṣṭhaṃ rūpaṃ tava darśitam ātma-yogād asādhāraṇān nija-sāmarthyāt
GE07bhg4c11u:1324: paratvaṃ vivṛṇoti tejo-mayaṃ tejaḥ-pracuraṃ viśvam samastam anantam ādyaṃ ca yan mama rūpaṃ tvad-anyena kenāpi na dṛṣṭa-pūrvam pūrvaṃ na dṛṣṭam
GE07bhg4c11u:1326: draṣṭum icchāmi te rūpam aiśvaraṃ puruṣottama iti tvat-prārthanayaivedaṃ mayā mad-aṃśasya viśva-rūpa-puruṣasya rūpaṃ darśitam /
GE07bhg4c11u:1327: katham atra te manaḥ pravyathitam abhūt ?
GE07bhg4c11u:1328: yataḥ prasīda prasīdety uktyā tan-mānuṣam eva rūpaṃ me didṛkṣase,
GE07bhg4c11u:1329: tasmāt kim idam āścaryaṃ brūṣe ity āha mayeti /
GE07bhg4c11u:1330: prasannenaiva mayā tava tubhyam evedaṃ rūpaṃ darśitam /
GE07bhg4c11u:1331: nānyasmai, yatas tvatto 'nyena kenāpi etan na pūrvaṃ dṛṣṭam /
GE07bhg4c11u:1332: tad api tvam etan na spṛhayasi kim iti bhāvaḥ //47//
GE07bhg4c11u:1333: baladevaḥ : evaṃ prārthito bhagavān uvāca mayeti /
GE07bhg4c11u:1335: draṣṭum icchāmi te rūpam ity ādi tvat-prārthitaṃ prasannena mayedaṃ tejo-mayaṃ paramaiśvaraṃ
GE07bhg4c11u:1336: rūpaṃ vaidūryavad abhinetṛ-naṭavac ca tvad-abhīṣṭe kṛṣṇe mayi sthitam eva tava darśitam /
GE07bhg4c11u:1337: ātma-yogān nijācintya-śaktyā me mama yad rūpaṃ tvad-anyena janena pūrvaṃ na dṛṣṭam /
GE07bhg4c11u:1338: tat-prasaṅgād idānīṃ tv anyair api devādibhir dṛṣṭaṃ bhakti-dṛśyaṃ mama tat-svarūpaṃ
GE07bhg4c11u:1339: bhaktaṃ tvāṃ prati pradarśayatā mayā tvad-dṛṣṭasya bahu-sākṣikatvāya devādibhyo 'pi
GE07bhg4c11u:1341: yat tu gaja-sāhvaye duryodhanādibhir api viśvarūpaṃ dṛṣṭaṃ tan nedṛgvidham iti tvad-anyena na dṛṣṭa-pūrvam ity uktam //47//
GE07bhg4c11u:1344: na ca kriyābhir na tapobhir ugraiḥ /
GE07bhg4c11u:1347: śrīdharaḥ : etad-darśanam atidurlabhaṃ labdhvā tvaṃ kṛtārtho 'sīty āha na vedeti /
GE07bhg4c11u:1348: vedādhyayanam avyatirekeṇa yajñādhyayanasyābhāvād yajña-śabdena yajña-vidyāḥ kalpa-sūtrādyā lakṣyante /
GE07bhg4c11u:1354: api tu tvam eva kevalaṃ mat-prasādena dṛṣṭvā kṛtārtho 'si //48//
GE07bhg4c11u:1356: etad-rūpa-darśanātmakam atidurlabhaṃ mat-prasādaṃ labdhvā kṛtārtha evāsi tvam ity āha na vedeti /
GE07bhg4c11u:1358: tathā mīmāṃsākalpa-sūtrādi-dvārā yajñānāṃ veda-bodhita-karmaṇām adhayayanair artha-vicāra-rūpair veda-yajñādhyayanaiḥ /
GE07bhg4c11u:1361: tapobhiḥ kṛcchra-cāndrāyaṇādibhir ugraiḥ kāyendriya-śoṣakatvena duṣkarair evaṃ-rūpo 'haṃ na śakyo nṛ-loke manuṣya-loke draṣṭuṃ tvad-anyena mad-anugraha-hīnena he kuru-pravīra /
GE07bhg4c11u:1364: na ca kriyābhir ity atra ca-kārād anukta-sādhanāntara-samuccayaḥ //48//
GE07bhg4c11u:1366: tubhyaṃ darśitam idaṃ rūpaṃ tu vedādi-sādhanair api durlabham ity āha na vedeti /
GE07bhg4c11u:1367: tvatto 'nyena na kenāpy aham evaṃrūpo draṣṭuṃ śakyaḥ /
GE07bhg4c11u:1370: tasmād alabhya-lābham ātmano matvā tvam asminn eveśvare,
GE07bhg4c11u:1372: etad-rūpaṃ dṛṣṭvāpy alaṃ te punar me mānuṣa-rūpeṇa didṛkṣiteneti bhāvaḥ //48//
GE07bhg4c11u:1373: baladevaḥ : atha sahasra-śīrṣādi-lakṣaṇasyaiśvara-rūpasya pumarthatām āha na vedeti /
GE07bhg4c11u:1378: ebhiḥ kevalair vedādhyayanādibhir bhakti-yuktāt tvatto 'nyena bhakti-riktena kenāpi puṃsā evaṃ-rūpo 'haṃ draṣṭuṃ na śakyo,
GE07bhg4c11u:1379: bhaktiṃ vinā bhūtāni vedādhyayanādīni mad-darśana-sādhanāni na bhavantīti / yad uktaṃ -
GE07bhg4c11u:1381: mad-bhaktyāpetam ātmānaṃ na samyak prapunāti hi // iti /
GE07bhg4c11u:1382: tvayā tu bhaktimatā dṛṣṭa evāham anyaiś ca bhaktimadbhir devādibhiḥ /
GE07bhg4c11u:1385: nṛ-loke ity uktes tal-loke tad-bhaktā devā bahavas tad draṣṭuṃ śaknuvantīty uktam //48//
GE07bhg4c11u:1387: mā te vyathā mā ca vimūḍha-bhāvo
GE07bhg4c11u:1390: tad eva me rūpam idaṃ prapaśya //49//
GE07bhg4c11u:1391: śrīdharaḥ : evam api cet tavedaṃ ghoraṃ rūpaṃ dṛṣṭvā vyathā bhavati tarhi tad eva rūpaṃ darśayāmīty āha mā ta iti /
GE07bhg4c11u:1392: īdṛg īdṛśaṃ ghoraṃ madīyaṃ rūpaṃ dṛṣṭvā te ā te vyathā māstu /
GE07bhg4c11u:1394: vigata-bhayaḥ prīta-manāś ca san punas tvaṃ tad evedaṃ mama rūpaṃ prakarṣeṇa paśya //49//
GE07bhg4c11u:1396: evaṃ ghoram īdṛg aneka-bāhv-ādi-yuktatvena bhayaṅkaraṃ mama rūpaṃ dṛṣṭvā sthitasya te tava yā vyathā bhaya-nimittā pīḍā sā mā bhūt /
GE07bhg4c11u:1397: tathā mad-rūpa-darśane 'pi yo vimūḍha-bhāvo vyākula-cittatvam aparitoṣaḥ so 'pi mā bhūt /
GE07bhg4c11u:1398: kintu vyapeta-bhīr apagata-bhayaḥ prīta-manāś ca san punas tvaṃ tad eva caturbhujaṃ
GE07bhg4c11u:1399: vāsudevatvādi-viśiṣṭaṃ tvayā sadā pūrva-dṛṣṭaṃ rūpam idaṃ viśva-rūpopasaṃhāreṇa prakaṭīkriyamāṇaṃ
GE07bhg4c11u:1400: prapaśya prakarṣeṇa bhaya-rāhityena santoṣeṇa ca paśya //49 //
GE07bhg4c11u:1404: yad anicchate 'pi mahyaṃ punar idam eva balād ditsasi /
GE07bhg4c11u:1408: tavāsmai paramaiśvaryāya dūrata eva mama namo namo 'stu,
GE07bhg4c11u:1409: na kadāpy ahaṃ evaṃ draṣṭuṃ prārthayiṣye /
GE07bhg4c11u:1411: tad eva mānuṣākāraṃ vapur apūrva-mādhurya-dhurya-smita-hasita-sudhā-sāra-varṣi-mukha-candraṃ me darśaya darśayeti vyākulam arjunaṃ prati sāśvāsam āha mā te iti //49//
GE07bhg4c11u:1412: baladevaḥ : yac ca tasminn eva mad-rūpe saṃhartṛtvaṃ mayā pradarśitaṃ tat khalu drapadī-pragharṣaṇaṃ
GE07bhg4c11u:1413: vīkṣyāpi tuṣṇīṃ sthitā bhīṣmādayaḥ sarve tat-pragharṣaṇa-kupitena mayaiva nihantavyā
GE07bhg4c11u:1414: na tu tan-nihanana-bhāras taveti bodhayitum atas tena tvaṃ vyathito mābhūr ity āha mā te vyatheti /
GE07bhg4c11u:1422: śrīdharaḥ : evam uktvā prāktanam eva rūpaṃ mat-sakhaṃ prasannaṃ tava saumyaṃ janārdana idānīm adhunāsmi saṃvṛttaḥ saṃjātaḥ /
GE07bhg4c11u:1426: vāsudevo 'rjunam iti prāg-uktam uktvā yathā pūrvam āsīt tathā svakaṃ rūpaṃ kirīṭa-makara-kuṇḍala-gadā-cakrādi-yuktaṃ
GE07bhg4c11u:1428: āśvāsayāmāsa ca bhītam enam arjunaṃ bhūtvā punaḥ pūrvavat saumya-vapur anugra-śarīro
GE07bhg4c11u:1429: mahātmā parama-kāruṇikaḥ sarveśvaraḥ sarvajña ity ādi-kalyāṇa-guṇākaraḥ //50 //
GE07bhg4c11u:1432: tathā mahā-madhuraṃ svakaṃ rūpaṃ caturbhujaṃ kirīṭa-gadā-cakrādi-yuktaṃ tat-prārthitaṃ madhuraiśvarya-mayaṃ bhūyo darśayāmāsa /
GE07bhg4c11u:1433: tataḥ punaḥ sa mahātmā somya-vapuḥ kaṭaka-kuṇḍaloṣṇīṣa-pītāmbara-dharo dvibhujo bhūtvā bhītam enam āśvāsayāmāsa //50//
GE07bhg4c11u:1434: baladevaḥ : tato yad abhūt tat saṃjaya uvāca ity arjunam iti /
GE07bhg4c11u:1435: vāsudevo 'rjunaṃ prati pūrvoktam uktvā yathā saṅkalpenaiva sahasra-śiraskaṃ rūpaṃ
GE07bhg4c11u:1436: darśitavān tathaiva svakaṃ nīlotpala-śyāmalatvādi-guṇakaṃ devakī-putra-lakṣaṇaṃ caturbhujaṃ
GE07bhg4c11u:1437: rūpaṃ darśayāmāsa evaṃ saumya-vapuḥ sundara-vigraho bhūtvā bhītam enam arjunaṃ punar āśvāsayāmāsa /
GE07bhg4c11u:1441: dṛṣṭvedaṃ mānuṣaṃ rūpaṃ tava saumyaṃ janārdana /
GE07bhg4c11u:1442: idānīm asmi saṃvṛttaḥ sacetāḥ prakṛtiṃ gataḥ //51//
GE07bhg4c11u:1443: śrīdharaḥ : tato nirbhayaḥ sann arjuna uvāca dṛṣṭvedam iti /
GE07bhg4c11u:1449: tato nirbhayaḥ san arjuna uvāca dṛṣṭvedam iti /
GE07bhg4c11u:1450: idānīṃ sacetā bhaya-kṛta-vyāmohābhāvenāvyākula-cittaḥ saṃvṛtto 'smi tathā prakṛtiṃ bhaya-kṛta-vyathā-rāhityena svāsthyaṃ gato 'smi /
GE07bhg4c11u:1453: tataś ca mahā-madhura-mūrtiṃ kṛṣṇam ālokyānanda-sindhu-snātaḥ sann āha idānīm evāhaṃ sa-cetāḥ saṃvṛttaḥ sa-ceto abhuvaṃ prakṛtiṃ gataḥ svāsthyaṃ prāpto 'smi //51//
GE07bhg4c11u:1454: baladevaḥ : tato nirvyathaḥ prasanna-manāḥ sann arjuna uvāca dṛṣṭvedam iti /
GE07bhg4c11u:1455: he janārdana tavedaṃ saumyaṃ manojñaṃ caturbhujaṃ rūpaṃ dṛṣṭvāham idānīṃ sa-cetāḥ prasanna-cittaḥ prakṛtiṃ vyathādy-abhāvena svāsthyaṃ ca gataḥ saṃvṛtto jāto 'smi /
GE07bhg4c11u:1456: kīdṛśaṃ rūpam ity āha mānuṣam iti /
GE07bhg4c11u:1459: pāṇḍaveṣu dvibhujaḥ kadācic caturbhujaś ca krīḍati /
GE07bhg4c11u:1464: sudurdarśam idaṃ rūpaṃ dṛṣṭavān asi yan mama /
GE07bhg4c11u:1465: devā apy asya rūpasya nityaṃ darśana-kāṅkṣiṇaḥ //52//
GE07bhg4c11u:1466: śrīdharaḥ : svakṛtasyānugrahasyātidurlabhatvaṃ darśayana bhagavān uvāca sudurdarśam iti /
GE07bhg4c11u:1467: yan mama viśva-rūpaṃ tvaṃ dṛṣṭavān asi /
GE07bhg4c11u:1469: yato devā apy asya rūpasya nityaṃ sarvadā darśanam icchanti kevalam /
GE07bhg4c11u:1472: sva-kṛtasyānugrahasyātidurlabhatvaṃ darśayan śrī-bhagavān uvāca sudurdarśam iti caturbhiḥ /
GE07bhg4c11u:1473: mama yad rūpam idānīṃ tvaṃ dṛṣṭavān asi,
GE07bhg4c11u:1474: idaṃ viśva-rūpaṃ sudurdarśam atyantaṃ draṣṭum aśakyam /
GE07bhg4c11u:1475: yato devā apy asya rūpasya nityaṃ sarvadā darśana-kāṅkṣiṇo na tu tvam iva pūrvaṃ dṛṣṭavanto na vāgre drakṣyantīty abhiprāyaḥ /
GE07bhg4c11u:1478: darśitasya svarūpasya māhātmyam āha sudurdarśam iti tribhiḥ /
GE07bhg4c11u:1479: devatā api asya darśanākāṅkṣiṇa eva na tu darśanaṃ labhante /
GE07bhg4c11u:1482: ataeva mayā divyaṃ dadāmi te cakṣuḥ iti divyaṃ cakṣur dattam /
GE07bhg4c11u:1483: kintu divya-cakṣur iva divyaṃ mano na dattam ataeva divya-cakṣuṣāpi tvayā na samyaktayā rocitaṃ man-mānuṣa-rūpa-mahā-mādhuryaika-grāhi-manaskatvāt
GE07bhg4c11u:1484: yadi divyaṃ mano 'pi tubhyam adāsyaṃ tadā deva-loka iva bhavān apy etad viśvarūpa pūruṣa-svarūpam arocayiṣyad eveti bhāvaḥ //52//
GE07bhg4c11u:1485: baladevaḥ : mayā pradarśitaṃ na veda-yajñādhyayaniḥ ity ādinā ślāghitaṃ ca sahasra-śiraskaṃ
GE07bhg4c11u:1486: mad-rūpaṃ śraddadhāno mat-priya-sakho 'rjuno manuṣya-bhāva-bhāvite śrī-kṛṣṇe mayi
GE07bhg4c11u:1487: kadācid viślatha-bhāvo mābhūd iti bhāvena svaka-rūpasya parama-puruṣārthatām upadiśati sudurdarśam iti /
GE07bhg4c11u:1491: yat tvaṃ sucirād dṛṣṭavān asi katham evaṃ praty emīti cet tatrāha devā apy asyeti /
GE07bhg4c11u:1492: etac ca daśamādau garbha-stuty-ādinā prasiddham eva //52//
GE07bhg4c11u:1494: nāhaṃ vedair na tapasā na dānena na cejyayā /
GE07bhg4c11u:1495: śakya evaṃ-vidho draṣṭuṃ dṛṣṭavān asi māṃ yathā //53//
GE07bhg4c11u:1496: śrīdharaḥ : atra hetum āha nāham iti /
GE07bhg4c11u:1499: kasmād devā etad-rūpaṃ na dṛṣṭavanto na vā drakṣyanti mad-bhakti-śūnyatvād ity āha nāham iti /
GE07bhg4c11u:1500: na veda-yajñādhyayanair ity ādinā gatārthaḥ ślokaḥ parama-durlabhatva-khyāpanāyābhyastaḥ //53//
GE07bhg4c11u:1502: kiṃ ca yuṣmad-aspṛhaṇīyam apy etat svarūpam anye puruṣārtha-sāratvena ye spṛhayanti,
GE07bhg4c11u:1503: tair vedādhyayanādibhir api sādhanair etaj jñātuṃ draṣṭuṃ cāśakyam eveti pratīhīty āha nāham iti //53//
GE07bhg4c11u:1505: evaṃvidho devakī-sūnuś caturbhujas tvat-sakho 'haṃ vedādibhir api sādhanaiḥ kenāpi puṃsā bhakti-śūnyena draṣṭuṃ na śakyo yathā tvaṃ māṃ dṛṣṭavān asi //53//
GE07bhg4c11u:1507: bhaktyā tv ananyayā śakya aham evaṃ-vidho 'rjuna /
GE07bhg4c11u:1508: jñātuṃ draṣṭuṃ ca tattvena praveṣṭuṃ ca paraṃtapa //54//
GE07bhg4c11u:1509: śrīdharaḥ : tarhi kenopāyena tvaṃ draṣṭuṃ śakya iti /
GE07bhg4c11u:1511: ananyayā mad-eka-niṣṭhayā bhaktyā tv evambhūto viśvarūpo 'haṃ tattvena paramārthato jñātuṃ śakyaḥ śāstrataḥ draṣṭuṃ pratyakṣataḥ praveṣṭuṃ ca tādātmyena śakyaḥ /
GE07bhg4c11u:1514: yadi veda-tapo-dānejyābhir draṣṭum aśakyas tvaṃ tarhi kenopāyena draṣṭuṃ śakyo 'sīty ata āha bhaktyeti /
GE07bhg4c11u:1517: jñātuṃ śakyo 'nanyayā bhaktyā kintu tattvena draṣṭuṃ ca svarūpeṇa sākṣātkartuṃ ca
GE07bhg4c11u:1519: tataś ca svarūpa-sākṣātkārād avidyā-tat-kārya-nivṛttau tattvena praveṣṭuṃ ca mad-rūpatayaivāsuṃ cāhaṃ śakyaḥ /
GE07bhg4c11u:1523: tarhi kena sādhanenaivaṃ prāpyata ity ata āha bhaktyā tv iti /
GE07bhg4c11u:1527: tadā tattvena brahma-svarūpatvena praveṣṭum apy ananyayā bhaktyaiva śakyo nānyathā /
GE07bhg4c11u:1528: jñānināṃ guṇībhūtāpi bhaktir antima-samaye jñāna-saṃnyāsānāntaram urvaritāllīyasy
GE07bhg4c11u:1529: ananyaiva bhavet tayaiva teṣāṃ sāyujyaṃ bhaved iti tato māṃ tattvato jñātvā viśate
GE07bhg4c11u:1531: baladevaḥ : abhimatāṃ para-bhaktaika-dṛśyatāṃ sphuṭayann āha bhaktyeti /
GE07bhg4c11u:1532: evaṃvidho devakī-sūnuś caturbhujo 'ham ananyayā mad-ekāntayā bhaktyā tu vedādibhis tattvato jñātuṃ śakyaḥ /
GE07bhg4c11u:1533: draṣṭuṃ pratyakṣaṃ kartuṃ tattvataḥ praveṣṭuṃ saṃyoktuṃ ca śakyaḥ /
GE07bhg4c11u:1534: puraṃ praviśatīty atra pura-saṃyoga eva pratīyate /
GE07bhg4c11u:1539: śrutiś caivam āha yasya deve parā bhaktiḥ ity ādyā /
GE07bhg4c11u:1541: na ca sudurdarśam ity ādi-trayaṃ sahasra-śīrṣa-rūpa-param iti vācyam /
GE07bhg4c11u:1544: tatra yasya tad-eka-vākyatāyāṃ nāhaṃ vedaiḥ ity ādeḥ paunarukty-āpatteś ca /
GE07bhg4c11u:1545: yat tu divya-dṛṣṭi-dānena liṅgena narākārāc caturbhujāt sahasra-śīrṣṇo devākārasyotkarṣam āha tad-avicāritābhidhānam eva devākārasya tasya caturbhuja-narākārādhīnatvāt
GE07bhg4c11u:1546: tattvaṃ ca tasya yuktam eva yaḥ kāraṇārṇava-jale bhajati sma yoga-nidrām iti smaraṇāt /
GE07bhg4c11u:1547: idaṃ narākṛti-kṛṣṇa-rūpaṃ saccidānandaṃ sarva-vedānta-vedyaṃ vibhuṃ sarvāvatārīti pratyetavyaṃ -
GE07bhg4c11u:1552: eko 'pi san bahudhā yo 'vabhāti [GTU 1.19] ity ādi śravaṇāt /
GE07bhg4c11u:1556: ete cāṃśa-kalāḥ puṃsaḥ kṛṣṇas tu bhagavān svayaṃ ity ādi smaraṇāc ca /
GE07bhg4c11u:1557: atrāpi svayam evoktaṃ mattaḥ parataraṃ nānyat iti,
GE07bhg4c11u:1558: aham ādir hi devānāṃ ity ādi ca /
GE07bhg4c11u:1559: arjunena ca - paraṃ brahma paraṃ dhāma ity ādi /
GE07bhg4c11u:1560: tasmād atiprabhāveṇa saṃkrānte sahasra-śīrṣṇi rūpe tena saṃkrāntaiva dṛṣṭir grāhiṇī yuktā,
GE07bhg4c11u:1562: bhāvena kṛṣṇa-rūpe sahasra-śīrṣatvavad arjuna-cakṣuṣi tādṛg-rūpa-grāhi tejastvam
GE07bhg4c11u:1567: karmodbhūtayā vidyayā sa-niṣṭhaiḥ sahasra-śiraskaṃ rūpaṃ labhyam iti durdarśaṃ tat narākṛti-kṛṣṇa-rūpaṃ tv ananyayā bhaktyaiveti sudurdarśaṃ tad uktam //54//
GE07bhg4c11u:1570: nirvairaḥ sarva-bhūteṣu yaḥ sa mām eti pāṇḍava //55//
GE07bhg4c11u:1571: śrīdharaḥ : ataḥ sarva-śāstra-sāraṃ paramaṃ rahasyaṃ śṛṇv ity āha mat-karma-kṛd iti /
GE07bhg4c11u:1573: aham eva paramaḥ puruṣārtho yasya saḥ /
GE07bhg4c11u:1577: evaṃ bhūto yaḥ sa māṃ prāpnoti / nānya iti //55//
GE07bhg4c11u:1583: adhunā sarvasya gītā-śāstrasya sāra-bhūto 'rtho niḥśreyasārthinām anuṣṭhānāya puñjīkṛtyocyate mad iti /
GE07bhg4c11u:1585: svargādi-kāmanāyāṃ satyāṃ katham evam iti nety āha mat-paramaḥ /
GE07bhg4c11u:1586: aham eva paramaḥ prāptavyatvena niścito na tu svargādir yasya saḥ /
GE07bhg4c11u:1587: ataeva mat-prāpty-āśayā mad-bhaktaḥ sarvaiḥ prakārair mama bhajana-paraḥ /
GE07bhg4c11u:1588: putrādiṣu snehe sati katham evaṃ syād iti nety āha saṅga-varjitaḥ /
GE07bhg4c11u:1590: śatruṣu dveṣe sati katham evaṃ syād iti nety āha nivairaḥ sarva-bhūteṣu /
GE07bhg4c11u:1591: apakāriṣv api dveṣa-śūnyo yaḥ sa mām ety abhedena /
GE07bhg4c11u:1593: ayam arthas tvayā jñātum iṣṭo mayopadiṣṭo nātaḥ paraṃ kiṃcit kartavyam astīty arthaḥ //55//
GE07bhg4c11u:1596: atha bhakti-prakaraṇopasaṃhārārthaṃ saptamādhyāyādiṣu ye ye bhaktā uktās teṣāṃ sāmānya-lakṣaṇam āha mat-karma-kṛd iti /
GE07bhg4c11u:1602: baladevaḥ : atha sva-prāpti-karīm ananyāṃ bhaktim upadiśann upasaṃharati mad iti /
GE07bhg4c11u:1604: mat-paramo mām eva na tu svargādikaṃ sva-pumarthaṃ jānan /
GE07bhg4c11u:1608: teṣv api mad-vimukheṣu pratikūleṣu satsu vaira-śūnyaḥ /
GE07bhg4c11u:1610: evambhūto yo māṃ narākāraṃ kṛṣṇam eti labhate, nānyaḥ //55//
